In uno equo emp. de d'no J. de Bermeton pro Priore Dunelm., 73s. 4d. In solucione facta apud Rokesburgh ad Nundinas pro parte solucionis 20ti boum emp. ibidem per terrarium, 40s. In cariacione 5 cervorum de foresta usque Coldingham Anno, etc., 30mo, 8s. 6d. In reparacione cancelli de Edirham fenestris vitreis novis factis et aliis emendandis, cum casul. fenestrarum ejus, visis particulis, 35s. 6d. In 2 novis fenestris vitreis in ecclesia de Ercildon, veter. emendand. et aliis rebus emp. pro d'ca ecclesia ut patet per parcellas, 18s. 2d. In expens. procur. per temp. comp., 71s. 11d. In cariacione 5 cervorum de foresta usque Coldingham Anno, etc., 31s. 9d.

DIV2.HEAD: Recepta fr. Will. de Hexham Nat. B. M., 1330, usque (blank).
DIV2.P: After receipts of the usual kind come expenses, not classified; the various entries ticked off with a pen as they have been verified.

In emendacione forcer d'ni Prioris et Chapis emp., 18d. Rogero Tornatori pro Chiphis ab eo emp. in festo Sci. Cuthb., 2s. 2d. Cuidam eunti apud Ketton cum Cingnis, 2d. Chithariste d'ni Rob'ti de Horneclyff ex precepto Prioris, 12d.

DIV2.HEAD: c. 1330. A headless portion; apparently for part of a year only.
DIV2.P: Rec. preter Arr., 800li. 5d. qa.
cum Arr., 925li. 18s. ob.

Garderoba. In 2 Brakkalibus cum ligulis emp. pro Priore apud Derlington, 2s. 10d. In 4xxli. zuker de Cipre, li. ad 6d.; 20li. zukur Babilon li. 7d., 51s. 8d. In 1 Mantica emp. pro d'no Priore, 14d. In salvenap' con∣ficiend., 7d. In 4or plustulis Buckles (Ducange). et 1 pare calcarium empt. pro Priore, 12d.

Marescalc. In 1 Barhud facta pro longa Carecta . . duobus Lynpinnes (etc.), 23s. 9d. In emendacione del Bagsadle, 1 cropper pro eadem . . 3s. In 6 Coleris pro equis del Wodecartes, 1 Cartesadle, 8 pipes, 1 cropper, 2 axibus pro axacione carectarum diversis vicibus, 10s. 3d. In 16 carteclutis, 2 lynpinnes, 2 Haxnailles, 2 Hurtours emp., 23d. In 40 capistris . . cum 2 kypstringges, 8s. 3d. In 2 frenis emp. pro pullanis domitandis, 2s. 4d.
Exp. Prioris per Maneria. (From about Pentecost to Holyrood; mostly at Beaurep.; met the Bishop at Ketton).
Exp. fratr. ver. Cellas. Sociis studentibus Oxoniis in pensione de Aluerton, 10li.

Dona et exhennia Prioris. Will'o Bracey peregrinanti Cantuar., 6s. 8d. Communitati de Hertilpoll ad murum ville perficiend., 40s. In Cultell. empt. in Nund. Dunolm. dat. clericis et vallectis d'ni Ep'i, 23s. In elem. d'ni Prioris data cuidam monacho de Passelay, fratribus de monte Carmel, et aliis, 45s. 5d. In donis datis Thome de Seton ad incepcionem suam, et diversis nunciis d'ni Regis et aliorum magnatum, 65s. 8d. In cultellis et panno emp. pro caligis inde faciendis pro donis d'ni Prioris, 19s. 7d.

Exp. nec. In 2 paribus Tualium pro altar. et 2 Manutergiis emp. in Nund. Dunelm., 5s. 4d. In pon∣deribus emp. ibidem, 6d. In 1 urceolo emp. pro aqua calefacienda pro camera Prioris, 15d. Vicario Bursarii in Ecclesia, 20d. In Terbentyn empt. pro cera facienda pro sigillo d'ni Prioris, 12d. In 2 Vestimentis integris cum tunicis et Dalmaticis, 1 capa, 4or peciis Orfrayes, 2 frontell. et 2 zonis emp., Probably for the Prior's chapel. 49s. In expens. Will'i de Massam et secum existencium diversis vicibus apud Fery ad vidend. solum subterraneum d'ni Prioris contra T. de Towres, 13s. 4d. In Erthening', Cheseclathe, Meles, et Skeles emp. pro Deyria de Beaurep., 3s. 2d. In 1 sera empt. pro le Melhous, 3d. In 3 Meles empt. pro Bracino, 9d. In 14 ulnis de Buralisaunder emp. pro vestment. ecclesiar. parochialium, 7s.

Structura domor. (Mostly repairs of mills. Millstones for Billingham and Scaltok). In muracione facta sub terra contra T. de Toures, 18s. 3d. In 1 stagno de muro lapideo facto pro molend. aquatico de Fery, 17s. 6d. In 1 fossato facto de molend. usque le viuer, 7s. 3d. In aqua portanda de Were So in a previous roll. quia pipa fracta, et in corda empta pro eadem, 2s. 4d.

DIV2.HEAD: c. 1330. Another headless roll, the same as the last, but not added up.
c. 1330. Another headless portion of a roll, different from the last.
DIV2.P: Marescalc. In 4 capistris cum Hedstall de rubeo cor. emp. pro equis carecte Prioris, 4s. In ferura equorum Prioris et aliorum superveniencium per diversas vices, 3s. 6d.
Exp. fr. ver. Cellas. D'no Suppriori versus Oxon. pro incepcione d'ni T. de Lunde, 40s. D'no T. Lunde pro incepcione sua, 6li. 13s. 4d.

Exp. nec. In 10 duoden. et 6 pelles pergameni emp., 14s. 2d. In casul. capis, frontell. palleis et manuterg. et carde empt. pro ecclesiis, de Arnalde de Rypon', 8li. 2s. 8d. In 1 tunica et 1 dalmatica emp. pro eisdem, 14s. In 4or pixid. emp. pro eisdem ad reponend. eukaristiam, 5s. 11d. In fialis emp. pro eisdem, 4s. In gruell emp. in villa per vices, 8s. In 35 qar salis emp. apud Coponmersk ad diversa precia, 107s. 3d. In 4 celdr. grossi salis emp. apud Novum Castrum, 40s. In sale emp. de Ric'o del Byschopprik, 28s. 7d. ob. Portant. aquam de Were ad Abathiam per 3 dies, 3s. In 2 peciis de Twyle pro saccis faciendis, 58s.

Exp. min. Quatuor mulieribus extrahentibus fagot' extra parcum de Beurep., 9d. Roberto Scot eunti ad Terrar. apud Beverlacum et iterum redeunti, 2s. 6d. Item eidem eunti bis ad d'nm J. de Ousthorp in Insula de Ely circa dec. de Estrington, 6s. 6d. Item eidem eunti apud Hull et Scm. Botulphum circa Stokfysche, 6s. 4d. Plicanti Cf. Ducange, s.v. Plicator. lanam per prioratum, 13s. 4d. Bambehele versus Houeden ad premuniend. homines de pecunia solvenda, 12d.

Structura domorum. Eustachio Sclater operanti ad introitum juxta le Cove per 3 sept., 6s. In perquisicione de Sclat' pro introitu predicto, 3s. 6d. Tribus mulieribus portantibus Sclat' de porta occid. ad Abathiam, 10d. Operantibus (duobus) in quarera circa Thill per duas ebdomadas, 3s. Quatuor Bayardours portantibus boscum et alia infra Abathiam et extra, 4li. 12s. 10d.
Exp. de Scocia. In contrib. facta Regi de termino Sci. Michaelis pro pace habenda, 8li. 5s. Eidem pro term. Pur., 6li. 8s. 4d. (cerv. cariand., etc., as before).

DIV2.HEAD: c. 1330. A small fragment.
DIV2.P: In cour. 9 coreorum cervinorum pro Priore, 2s. 8d. Sarculantibus apud Dalton post mortem servientis, 18d.

DIV2.HEAD: c. 1330. Another fragment, crumbling to pieces and almost illegible.
Debita que Domus Dunolmensis debet die Nat. B. V., 1330, post compotum Joh'is de Crepping Burs. Dunolm.
Vendiciones Decimarum, 1330.
c. 1330. Two Vendiciones rolls.
1331. Recept. f'ris Rob. de Middilham Burs. de Magno Cyrograffo per tempus compoti sui.
DIV2.P: (Last period named is Term. Pent., 1331.

DIV2.HEAD: Debita domus post Comp. Walt. de Skaresbrek, die S. Martini, 1331.
DIV2.P: Ricardo Urdremayster, 6s. 8d. (etc.).

DIV2.HEAD: c. 1331? A fragment much eaten away by mice.
c. 1333? A long roll wanting the first skin, labelled 1333.
DIV2.P: Garderoba. In 1 hucheo empt. pro palefrido misso d'ne Regine, cum Hucheo de canabo, 7s. In 1 carecta conducta pro garderoba carianda de Beuerlaco usque Dunolm., 26s. 8d. In 3li. zukur in plate et 2li. drages emp. de A. de Communa, 4s. 5d.

Exp. nec. Mulieri portanti sablonem pro plumbo bracine, 22d. In batello lapideo de novo facto, cum clavis emptis pro eodem, 26s. ob. In redempcione cujusdam libri de Coldingham post spoliacionem, 30s.

DIV2.HEAD: Debita domus post Comp. d'ni Rob. de Middilham, 1333.
1333-4? A large roll, the head of which is wanting. Term. Pent., 1333, is mentioned near the beginning, as is the installation of Bp. de Graystanes (1333) further on.
DIV2.P: Summa tocius Rec. preter Arreragia, 1707li. 7s. 4d.
cum Arr., 1819li. 12s. 2d. qa.

Garderoba. Twenty-three persons have sums varying from 4s. to 40s.; pro roba sua, or pro garniamento suo. Magr Will. de Kellaw has pecunia data in loco Robarum, 20s. Many payments for sugar, and for ginger, etc.
In sindone et serico empt. pro capa d'ni Prioris, 23d.
In frumento empto, nl, quia habuimus in manu nostra hoc anno 19 decimas infra aquas pro sustentacione domus, prout superius ostensum est.
Empcio Cervisie. In 3858 lag. Cervisie empt. in villa ad diversa precia, 22li. 12s. 6d. In 393 lag. Cervisie empt. in villa per d'nm J. de Barnby in absencia bursarii, 43s.
Summa, 24li. 5s. 6d.
Marescalo. In reparacione 1 tribuli ferr. pro bracina, 3d.

Expen. d'ni Prioris per Maneria. In expen. d'ni Prioris apud Ketton obviantis Ep'o R. de Graystanes venienti de Consecracione, factis per dom J. de Barnby, 10s. 1d. Item per burs. eodem tempore, 4d. ob. In exp. ejusdem apud Beaurep. in adventu doi pro 3 sep., 7li. 18d. In exp. ejusdem apud Ebor. ad loquend. cum d'no nostro Ep'o Ricardo, 10li. 11s. 4d. In pisc. et carn. missis apud
Ketton contra adventum d'ni Prioris de Ebor., 5s. 9d. In di. copul. allec. emp. et miss. apud Ketton, 5s. In expen. ejusd. apud Ketton obviantis d'no Ep'o Ric'o, 15s. 4d. (etc.).

Expen. d'ni R. de Graystan' Episcopi. In vino empto, videlicet 9 lag. die Installacionis d'ni R. de Gray∣stanes, 6s. pr. 8d. In expn d'nor. W. de Dunolm et W. de Dalton euntium apud Ebor. pro consecracione, 13s. 4d. In expen. ejusdem d'ni R. Ep'i eund. et redeund. apud Regem et d'nm Ric'um Ep'm apud Ketton 4 vicibus, 40s. per J. de B(arnby). In expens. ejusdem apud Beureper quando ultimo redibat de partibus australibus, 19s. 8d. In panno de Totenays empt. pro houzes equorum ejusdem, 7s. 4d. In ferura palefridi ejusdem, 8d. In pecunia eidem liberata pro expen. suis mut. de Ad. de Boughes, 10li.
Summa, 14li. 7s.

Expen. Terrar. Not in previous rolls. In expen. Terrar. et R. de Middel∣ham burs., ad Nundin. de Derlyngton, 6s. 10d. In 1 panell pro sellar. summar. Terrar., freno, barur. et sacc. reparand., cum oleo empto, 2s. 8d. In expen. ejusdem in novo solario cum vicecomite et aliis de patria, 23d. In exp. ejusd. cum vicecomite et aliis extraneis in patria et in tercio turno Halmot. factis per seipsum, 62s. 1d. ob. qa. In exp. ejusdem mensurantis terram apud Houghale, 4d. In exp. ejusdem apud Ketton et Fery in 2do Turno factis per burs., 7s. 8d. In exp. ejusd. apud Beaulue in eodem turno per burs., 15s. 8d. In exp. ejusd. apud Wiuestow in eodem turno per burs., 11s. 7d. In exp. senescalli Petri de Hilton Terrar. et Rob'ti de Middelham in primo turno apud Pyt. in absencia J. de Bar(n)by, videlicet in cervisia, 2s. 4d.
Exp. ver. cellas. In exp. 2 sociorum Oxon. student., 13li. 6s. 8d.
Elemosina consueta. In distribucione facta pro anima R. de Graystan Ep'i, 10s.

Dona et exennia d'ni Pr. et Conv. Duobus histrionibus in die Veneris prox. post Oct. beati Martini, 2s. Pro∣visoribus d'ne Regine ex precepto d'ni Prioris, 5s. 6d. Histrionibus d'ni Regis quando d'ns noster Rex rediit de Novo Castr., 40s. Clericis de capella d'ni Ep'i, 20s. Venatori d'ni Ep'i, 12d. Stulto d'ni Ep'i, 6s. 8d. Hugoni Bayllol venienti cum literis Regis Scocie, 2s. Nunciis d'ni Regis quando rediit de Novo Castro, 13s. 4d.
Polidodde, 3s. 4d. Cuidam coco d'ni Regis dicentis se habere quamdam obligacionem de Celerario Mich. de Chilton, 6s. 10d. Garcioni ejusdem, 2s. Histrionibus comitis Warenn', 6s. 8d. Garcioni d'ni Ep'i existenti apud Wardley quando dous Rex fuit apud Novum Castrum, 12d. Rob'to de . . yngham, 12d. Histrionibus Regis Scocie, 3s. 4d. Subvicecomit. Ebor. cum 1 pare cerote∣carum, 14s. 4d. In 2 bobus et 1 vacca empt. pro exenn. misso d'no Ep'o, 50s. 6d. In 1 bove empt. de manerio de Belasis pro eodem exenn., 16s. Except. 12 porc. rec. de Wodyard et 14 multon. r. dc Instauro de Muclyngwik. In 12 vitulis emp. de Waltero Lelpay pro eodem exennio, 40s. In 5 ulnis panni de bluett. emp. pro 1 houze ad palefr. d'no Ep'o missum, 3s. 9d.; pro 1 houze ad palefr. missum d'no Regi, 4s. 6d. In panno rubeo pro eodem houze, 16d. In factura ejusdem houze, 12d. In 3 uln. canab. pro 1 houze, 12d.; in factura ejusd., 1d. In 5 altilibus Fat hens; see Ducange. emp. pro exennio misso d'no Ep'o apud Aukeland post festum Trinitatis, quando rediit, 20d. In 24 aucis emp. de provisore Ep'i pro predicto exennio, 8s. In 1 equo emp. de Rogero Turnour pro carecta d'no Regi missa, 20s., exceptis aliis quatuor equis receptis de maneriis et stabulo d'ni Prioris qui hic non appreciantur. De quibus 2 venerunt de maneriis de Wiuestow et Fulwell. In 4 Coleris empt. pro equis predictis, 4s. 3d. In 1 sella empt. pro carecta predicta, 2s. 2d. In 5 capit. capistr. de Rubeo coreo, et 4 card. eisdem de canabo, et 8 pipes pro tractubus, et 4 par. tractuum pro predicta carecta, 11s. 2d. In 2 flekes emp. pro carecta predicta, 2s. Cuidam garcioni eunti cum carecta, 5s. In 1 croper, hamys, et 1 coler emp. de Rogero de Houeden, 2s. 8d. In albo coreo emp. pro predicto harnasio, 12d. In albo unguento, 4d. In reparacione predicti harnasii quando venerunt de Novo Castro pro pane, cum 1 axe empt., 18d. In 20 uln. canab. empt. pro saccis in quibus ponebatur prebenda in predicta carecta, 5s. 10d. Joh'i Pode eunti cum eadem carecta, 5s. 8d. In 1 cupa deaurata emp. pro d'no Rob'to de Tanton, 63s. 4d. Clerico ejusdem scribenti literas sub sigillo privato pro confirmacione cartarum, 6s. 10d., cum cerotecis. Alteri clerico ejusdem cum cerotecis, 3s. 6d. Clerico vicecomitis Northumbr., 3s. 4d. Cuidam mulieri portanti piscem pro exennio d'no Archiep'o Ebor. misso, 2d. Joh'i de Dunelm. pro audicione comp. servient., 40s. In 1 bursa, 15d. In exp. factis super . . . d'ni G. de Scropp apud Eluethall, 9s. 8d.

DIV2.HEAD: Dona data hominibus Regis et Regine pro bladis et fenis salvandis.
DIV2.P: b Will'mo de Colgayth, provisori Regis frumenti, cum cerotecis, 5s. 2d. Rog'o magistro de pistrina et Henr. de Pultr. d'ni Regis in pecunia, 6s. 8d. In 1 pare cero∣tecarum magnarum et 1 bursa rubea empt. pro eisdem, 2s. 3d. Garcioni dicti Rogeri, 12d. Rob'to de Corbrigg provisori similiter frumenti in pecunia, cum cerotec., 20d. Joh'i de Thirlaw provisori pro carectis d'ni Regis cum cerotecis, 6s. 10d. Joh'i de Brymmesgrove provisori focalis, 2s. 2d. Will'o de Walden coronatori Marescalc. d'ni Regis per preceptum d'ni Prioris, 3s. 4d. In 1 bursa, 16d. Will'mo de March provisori pro summar. d'ni Regis, 6s. 8d. In 1 bursa, 15d. Garcioni ejusdem, 12d. Arnaldo Garsy provisori pro dextrar. d'ni Regis, cum cerotec., 6s. 10d. Petr. de Boynton servienti suo, cum cerotec., 3s. 6d. Will'mo de Weston cum cerotec., 6s. 10d. Joh'ni de Melford pyncerne d'ni Regis in caligis empt., 13d. Duobus hominibus comitis Lyncoln. com∣morant. apud Pytyngton, cum 2 par. cerotecar., 7s. Math'o provisori pro carect., 3s. 6d. cum cerot. Ad. Mer. . . . cerotec. commoranti apud Billingham, 3s. 6d. Joh'i de Keyington provisori aven. pro Regina cum cerotec., 7s. 10d. Joh'i de Bacheford provisori frumenti pro eadem cum cerotec., 6s. 10d. Duobus garcionibus inservientibus fenum in granar. d'ni Prioris, 12d. Thome Roter ad donand. malefactor. apud Wiuestow, 2s. Duobus garcionibus apud Meryngton, ut minus malum facerent, 2s. In expen. et cenis factis hominibus Regis et Regine in patria per d'nm J. de Barnby, 41s. a—a The reference letters seem to mean that the account begins here. Ad. Charles provisori Regine de Herbagio et feno post Pent., 4s. 6d. cum 1 bursa empt. Garcioni ejusdem, 6d. Provisori d'ni Regis de frumento ad Pent., 4s. 6d. cum 1 bursa magna. Prov. Regine de fr. ad idem fest. cum burs., 4s. 6d. Ric'o de Kendale prov. pro equis G. Talbotis cum cerotec., 2s. 2d. In carn. empt. pro garcionibus Offic. d'ni Regis morant. apud Pytyngton, 8d. Cuidam de Boteleriis d'ni Regis, 2s. In butyr. et pisc. empt. pro hominibus d'ni Regis, 14d. Ad. Gelle provis. Reg. mor. apud Beaulue per manus Terr., 3s. 4d.

Exp. nec. In 1 disco et salsario argenteis factis pro Refectorio ponder., 33s. 4d. ext' le laye, 36s. 1d. In 1
portiforio empt. de Procur. de Norham pro ecclesia de Ackeley, 32s. In salario 21 mulierum portantium aquam de Were usque Abbathiam diversis vicibus, 21d. In corda empta pro aqueductu diversis vicibus, 22d. In exp. Rogeri de Blaykeston apud Ebor. ad impetrand. breve de condonat. victual. doi Regis, 18s. In 3 cribris empt. pro granario et uno Growelseve et 1 colour pro pistrina, et reparacione 5 cribrorum cum albo coreo et—, Something like clau, with the mark for er, but perhaps meant for clavis. 2s. 2d. In di. busc. de Gruello emp., 8d. In cord. empt. pro Aqueductu per J. de Barnby, 2d. In 5 petr. et di. stanni emp. apud Derlyngton, 13s. 9d., pro petr. 2s. 6d. In 4 copulis ferri factis pro catulis d'ni Regis, 12d. In sportis parvis empt. pro pistrina, 21d. In Coagulo et Chesfattes emp. pro Deyr de Beaurep., 18d. Vicecomiti Novi Castr. et clericis ejusdem pro retornacione brevium de victual. ad parvos exitus cum cerotecis, 40s. 2d.

Exp. min. Cuidam garcioni venienti de Oxon. cum literis d'no R. de Graystan Ep'o, 2s. Heruico Hunter portanti literas apud Ebor. d'no R. de Graystanes, 15d. Cuidam garcioni portanti literas apud Ebor. d'no R. de Graystanes de consensu capituli de consecracione, 10d. Heruico Hunter portanti literas eidem d'no Roberto London, 4s. Heruico Hunter et Waltero Mauȝhan euntibus cum emerlionibus (?) Three strokes between the e and the curl which usually stands for er. ad com. Warenn' ex parte Prioris, 11d. Heruico Hunter ad explorand. Scottos in Northumbr., ad expensas, 12d.

Structur. domor. Carpentar. pro opere de Gylhous bracine, 13li. 12s. 10d. In 2 Gat' empt. pro mortario portand., 5d. In 1 Cribro pro calce mundando, 1d. ob. (Ironwork and glazing of two windows in the church of Allerton). In 2 flodyates de novo factis cum pertinent. in parco de Beaurep., 3s. 9d.

DIV2.HEAD: 1334-5. A headless roll, similar to the last. The date is mentioned in the final summing up.
DIV2.P: Garderoba. In 5xx ulnis de Totenays empt. pro pauperibus, 58s. 4d. In 10li. Zukur, ficuum, et racemorum empt. pro d'no G. Scruppe et aliis in Camera Prioris in primo (?) xle, 15d.

Marescalc. In Sandragon, Coppros, et vertegrece empt. pro pede 1 equi de longa carecta, 9d. In 2 felys, 2 spakes
positis in rotis longe carecte, reparacione 1 strakis, 35 straknaill', et 4 wyndbandes, 23d. (24 st. of iron for ligature of wheels). In 1 Rerecord et reparacione dicte carecte, 3d.

Exp. d'ni Prioris. In 1 hanaperia facta pro discis argenteis d'ni Prioris, cum ligatura ejusdem, 3s. In reparacione 1 furur. de cuniculo, 10d. In 1 Pixide de Plyris cum musco empt. pro eodem, 3s. In factura 1 pecie de argent. pro speciebus, 9s. In 1 Male de nigro coreo empt. pro d'no Priore, 2s. 2d.
Exp. Burs. per Maneria. Apud Wyuestowe, Novum Castrum, et in passagio apud Bonefery, Or Bouefery? 2s. 11d.

Dona Prioris et Conv. Histrionibus ad Natale, 12d. Joh'i Ferour pro medicin' pro infirmitate sua, 3s. 4d. Cuidam pulsanti organa in festo Pasche, 12d. Joh'i Lasouche marescallo d'ne Regine cum Cyrothec., 13s. 6d.

DIV3.P: Expen. d'ni Will'i de Scaccario in Scocia cum d'no Rege Anglie. In 1 sacco emp. pro phaleris ejusdem de Burs., 10s. In 1 Barhyde emp. pro eodem, 5s. In 1 equo emp. (Roll obliterated by wet).

Expen. facte pro hominibus Regis, et Dona data eisdem. In pisce emp. pro d'no Ricardo de Nateby, clerico d'ni Regis, quando solvit pecuniam pro victualibus apud Dunelm., 2s. 3d. In pelle 1 cervi emp. pro eodem, 2s. 3d. Garcionibus suis, 14d. Joh'i de Byry Marescallo equorum Regine, ne malum faceret in Maneriis, cum cyrothecis, 7s. 10d. Tribus hominibus suis, 6s. In 1 pari cyrothecarum empt. pro clerico suo, 2d. Cuidam alteri garcioni suo, 14d. Charles provisori pro equis Regine, cum cyrothecis, 3s. 6d. Cuidam garcioni Stephano nomine venienti de Berwyco cum grossis equis et socio suo, 4s. 4d. In 2 gallinis empt. pro Augustino et hominibus Regis, 5d. Joh'i de Kenyngton cum cyrothecis, 4s. 6d. Will'o de Bacheford provisori Regine de frumento cum cyrothecis, 3s. 6d. Garcioni suo, 12d. (More entries of a similar kind, injured by wet).

Exp. nec. In 1 coreo equino empt. pro le Maltspout in Bracina, et reparacione ejusdem, 19d. In exp. d'ni Joh'is Fossour apud Ebor. circa expedicionem carte confirmacionis de Farne, 33s. In mercede 14 mulierum portancium aquam de Were usque ad Abbathiam per
1 diem et di., 2s. 11d., Cuilibet 2d. ob. In mercede 12 mulierum port. aquam ibidem per di. diem, 6d. In corda empta per vices pro acqueductu, 7d.

DIV2.HEAD: Comp. fr. Will. de Hextildesham, 1335-6.
DIV2.P: Summa tocius Rec. preter arr.,
1752li. 18s. 7d. ob. qa.
cum arr., 2001li. 19s. 6d.

Garderoba. In 1 panno emp. pro quissins, 3s. 7d. In factura eorundem, et reparacione quissinorum veter. camere d'ni Prioris, cum flokkes et coreo empt. pro eisdem, 7s. 3d. ob. In 2li. draget, 1li. et di. de pynes, 2li. de grayn, di. li. de Maces, di. li. de Saunders, anys et licor., 4s. 11d.

Empcio vini. In ulnagio duorum doleorum vini et expens. circa ulnacionem eorundem apud Hertilpole, 3s. 10d. In 5 lagen. et 3bus quart. vini de vernag. emp. contra festum Sci. Cuthb. et per vices, 11s. 6d.

Mareschalcia. In 6 capistr. de coreo emp. pro equis longe carecte, 2s. 6d. In 4xx 10 de Strakenayll et 12 clout. empt. pro bigis cariantibus boscum, 2s. 6d. In 1 flasket, pane, aceto, sagimini, oleo olive, et gummis empt. pro equis Regis et Regine, 7s. . . d.
Exp. fratrum versus Cellas. (Quatuor) Scolaribus Oxon. commorantibus, 20li.

Dona Prioris. In 1 Cuppa argentea et 1 urceolo aquatico deaurato dato Thome del Holme Mercatori, 66s. 8d. Magistro Petro Vaurello, 66s. 8d. Histrionibus d'ni Regis Scocie, 5s. Duobus Cursoribus d'ni Regis Anglie venient. de Scocia, 2s. Duobus histrionibus die Sci. Cuthberti, 2s. Venatori d'ne de Bedal, 3s. 10d. Cuidam cursori venienti de Scocia d'no W. de Scaccario, 2s. Duobus histrionibus ex precepto Prioris, 2s. Filiis Magistri Will'i de Kellawe versus scolas, 6s. 8d. Joh'i de Haneryngton et soc. suis placitantibus pro d'no Priore 2 vicibus, 13s. 8d. Item aliis Narratoribus et Apprenticiis placitantibus pro eodem, 40s. Ade de Ludworth, Rogero socio suo, et Ricardo pagio Terrarii eunti ad reginam apud Aukland, 3s. 6d. Item pueris de Capella d'ni Ep'i Dunelm., 6s. 8d. Item nunciis d'ni Regis Scocie, 3s. 4d. Histrionibus Novi Castri ad fest. S. Cuthb., 3s. 4d. Item histrionibus d'ni R. de Neuill, per Priorem, 3s. 4d. Jacobo de Waltham et socio suo nunciis d'ni Regis, 2s.
In 1 Cythara emp. pro Thom. Harpour, 3s. Bedell Ep'i ex precepto Prioris, 3s. 4d. Cuidam histrioni apud Beaurep. per R. de Cotam ex dono Prioris, 12d. Thome fatuo ex precepto ejusdem, 12d. Thome Talpatori ex precepto ejusdem, 6d. (etc.).

Dona Terr. et Burs. ministris d'ni Regis et Regine pro bladis et feno et Cariagio salvandis. In zonis, bursis de serico, et Cyrothecis magnis sex duoden. et di. parvarum Cyroth., 75s. Joh'i de Thorp provisori cariag. d'ni Regis, 2s. Cuidam Merlino, garcioni d'ni Regis, 3s. 4d. Cuidam ministro d'ne Regine, pro salvacione casei apud Beaur., 2s. Garcionibus Joh'is de Barton apud Derlington, 12d. Garcioni pultarii apud Ketton, 6d. Joh'i Gentilcors per Terrarium, 6s. 8d. Joh'i de Kennygton cum cyrothec., 5s. 2d. Will'o de Culgayth, 5s. Joh'i de Barton, 6s. 8d. Item garc. Joh'is de Claxton et cuidam alii pro lib. duorum equorum capt. ad cariag., 12d. Garcionibus d'ni Regis pro transgr. hominum nostrorum, 33s. Garcioni Petri de Panetr., 12d. Garcionibus Regine per Burs. in Abbath., 6s. 8d. Cuidam venienti cum J. Summario d'ni Regis, 12d. Duobus ministris d'ni Regis impedientibus tritu∣racionem bladi de Wyuestowe et Wardeley, 6s. 8d. In diversis expensis factis circa homines Regis et Regine per Terrar., 6s. Hominibus Regine per servientem de Houghal, 2s. Cuidam venienti de d'no W. de Scaccario cum 1 equo de d'no Rege, 5s. In 1 lagena vini emp. pro quodam equo d'ne Regine, 8d. In cervis. et 7 gall. (sic) empt. pro quibusdam de familia Regis et Regine in redditu eorundem, 2s. 1d. Item Ric'o de Neuton pro salvacione feni in redditu suo de Scocia, 2s. 6d. Item Lardinar. d'ni Regis, 6s. 8d. Item garcionibus Regine per dn'm R. de Regis, 6s. 8d. Item garcionibus Regine per dn'm R. de Middilham apud Beaur', 6s. 8d. Item cuidam emptori d'ne Regine, 8s. 10d. In 1 pari botarum empt. pro quodam Ric'o morante apud Merington et Fery cum bobus Regine inpinguendis, 2s. 2d. Pistori d'ne Regine, 3s. 4d. Item cuidam garcioni de Curia Regia ne caperet forag. apud Houghal, 12d. Item hominibus vallie Over an erasure; Qu., Vallie, of Wales? obviantibus d'no Priori super moram de Beaur', 12d.

Exp. nec. In linea tela emp. et uno coagulo pro deyr' de Beaur', 17d. In factura discorum argenteorum per Priorem, 31s. 4d. In 7 sportis emp. pro exennio misso d'no Regi, 18d. In 7 doleis vacuis pro cuvis in abbathia et Eluethal, 7s. 11d. In oblacione 2 Noviciorum ad primas missas, 4s. 7d. In 1 hayr pro Toral. de Eluethal
apud Ebor. cum exp. ement., 15s. 8d. In 2 pec. panni de Twyll pro saccis empt. et in eisdem consuend., 14s. 3d. It. in 1 mantica empt. pro Rotulis Halm., 14d. In 1 Banqwer empt. pro solario caritativo, 3s. 2d. It. in 1 Rete empt. pro pisce querend. ad Molend. de Skaltok, 12d. In emendacione conductus Abbathie, 2s. In corda empta pro eodem, 19d.

DIV3.P: In mundacione capitis fontis Abbathie, 8s. Juvantibus conductum aque de Eluethal per 2 dies, 12d. In 5 gall. in pasc., 2 lag. vini emp. pro Justic. in festo Sci. Jacobi, 2s. 6d. ob. In 2 lag. vini, 6 pull. gall., pomis, prunis, et 6 lib. candel. pro eisdem alia vice, 2s. 1d. ob. Item venatori contra festum Pasch. et Sci. Cuthb., 11s. It. mulieri portanti piscem de Ketton, Beaulu usque Dunelm., pro Com. Warannie, 22d. In j buss. farine spelucat' emp. contra Natale et festum Sci. Cuthberti, 16d. In pane d'nico et sim'l emp. pro Rege et Regina et aliis super∣venientibus, 4s. 9d. In brevibus impetrandis, copiis brevium transcribendis contra figulator' de Gatesheued, 8s. 5d. In exp. ejusdem (Ric. de Woluiston) cum vexillo Sci. Cuthberti, versus Scoc' cum d'no Rege, 10li. Item eidem per d'nm Michaelem, 40s. In reparacione harnas. ejusdem versus Scoc. cum d'no Rege, 11s. 11d. Item 3 garcionibus d'ni Prioris euntibus cum eodem, 6s.

Exp. min. Mulieri portanti aquam de Were usque Abbatiam, 6s. 10d. Octo mulieribus portantibus exennium missum Regine, 8d. In 1 Barowe cum Rota empt. pro J. Bek', 5d. In carnibus recent. empt. pro falconibus d'ni Regis, 4d. Item cuidam garcioni eunti apud Hertilpol circa garnistur', 2d. Joh'i Pode eunti cum Carecta cum Archiepiscopo Cantuar., 2s. It. 3 garc. eunt. cum equis versus Austrum cum Regina, 9s. 6d. Item Thome Talpatori versus Berwyc, 18d. Item Joh'i de Nesbyt pro expen. suis apud Mukl. pro hominibus Regis removendis, 4d.
Structura domorum. In expen. factis circa Torale de Eluethall, 46s. 3d. ob. In 25m de Strabrod. In 221 perticatis fossatis factis circa clausuram stalonis et Jumen∣torum de Beaur., 4li. 7s.
Empcio focalis. In focali empt. pro Archiep'o Cantuar. et aliis minutis exp., 2s. 6d.

Contribuciones. D'no Regi pro temporalibus et spiritualibus Prioris infra Episcopatum Dunelm., 26li. 2d. ob. Duobus Episcopis, nunciis d'ni pape pro mora sua in Dioc. Dunelm. pro ecclesiis Prioris, 6li. 11s. 7d. ob.

HEAD.HI: Two duplicates of the above roll, both headless.

DIV2.HEAD: c. 1335. Fragment.
DIV2.P: Marescalcia. In attramentis et gummis emp. pro equis Regis Scocie, 2s. 6d.
Empcio herbe et feni. In feno empto pro equis d'ne Regine, 2s. 6d. In herba empta pro equis Regis Scocie, 14d.
Empc. preb. In 1 qar avene emp. ad prebend. equor. hominum Regis, 2s. 4d.
Elem. cons. In distribucione pauperum die sepulture d'ni J. de Seton, 10s.
Exp. fr. ver. cellas. Studentibus apud Oxon. in pens. de Aluerton, 20li.

Dona Prioris. D'no Joh'i de Bures, Militi, Senescallo hospicii d'ne Regine, pro blado et feno Prioris salvandis, ut in expensis suis et hominum suorum apud Fery, per Terrarium, 66s. 8d. Et in una Cupa argent. emp. et dat. eidem, 40s. Marescallo comitis Cornubie pro quodam equo suo quem dixit interfectum fuisse infra Abbathiam, 40s. Servientibus Regis ad arma, 40s. Provisoribus Regis per vices, 25s. Coronatori Regis et pincerne R., 15s. 4d. Istrionibus d'ni R., 20s. Nuncio R., 3s. 4d. Marescallo Regine, 6s. 8d. Istrionibus Regine apud Pytingdon, 13s. 4d. Avenariis Reg., 11s. 8d. Lar∣denario, 6s. 8d. Clerico capelle, 2s. Et in donis datis diversis de Hospicio et familia Ep'i quorum nomina, etc., die Dominica proxima post festum Epiphanie, quo die d'ns Ep'us epulabatur cum Priore, per visum et testimonium d'ni Walteri de Skaresbrek, Terrar., 12li. 5s. 8d. It. clerico Ep'i magistro puerorum, 6s. 8d. Istrionibus eodem die, 20s. Will'o de Sutton Citharedo d'ni Galfridi Lescrop eodem die, 6s. 8d. In 3 carcos. boum empt. prec. cujuslibet 10s. 8d., et 12 cass. multonum, prec. cujuslibet 12d. emp. et missis d'ne Regine apud Aukland, 53s. 4d. In 2 carcos. boum, 4 carcos. porc., 4 carcos. vitul. emp. et missis d'no Ep'o, 45s. Istrionibus die Natalis D'ni, 6s. 8d. Duobus
Cursoribus Regis et Regine venientibus apud Pytingdon, 6s. 8d. Duobus Cursoribus Reg. Scoc. et Com. Warr., 2s. Duobus pueris de Tuttebyr', 2s. (etc.).

DIV2.HEAD: 1335. Recepta Will'i de Hexham de Veteri Cyrograffo et Novo.
DIV2.P: (Indenture with counterpart).

DIV2.HEAD: 1335. Vendiciones Decimarum.
DIV2.P: (Two rolls).

DIV2.HEAD: c. 1336. A headless portion, and a duplicate with an illegible head.
DIV2.P: Elemos. consueta. In pane emp. ad distribuend. pauperibus diebus migracionis dominorum Will'i de Gyseburn senioris et Willelmi de Dunelm., 20s.

Dona et exhennia Prioris. Duobus Istrionibus d'ni Regis, 6s. 8d. In volatil. empt. pro presento inde faciendo d'no E'po venienti apud Dunelm. post fest. Sci. Martini, 7s. In 4 porcis (ut supra) eadem vice, 26s. 8d. Jacobo Coco Prioris ex precepto Prioris, 2s. In dono Joh'i de Barton et Joh'i de Thirlawe, provisoribus Regis, die Lune prox. post fest. Epiphanie, cuilibet eorum 5s., et 1 par cirot. alb. prec. 2d., 10s. 4d. Duobus nunciis Regis ex dono Prioris, 6s. 8d. Cuidam garcioni Regis, venienti pro canibus Regis, de dono Prioris, 2s. Cuidam garcioni deferenti literas cujusdam Mercatoris de London. ad d'nm Priorem, 2s. Cuidam garcioni perhendinanti in Abbathia cum quodam equo Regis vocato Morell de Cobham, et recedenti cum dicto equo die Martis in septimana Pasche, de dono Prioris pro expensis suis et equi predicti versus Regem, 5s. Edmundo de Kendall, Cythareto, de dono Prioris ad Pascha, 2s. Cuidam Roberto Fytheler qui cepit Otres apud Wardeley, The moated site of the Prior's manor-house at Wardley may still be recognized. per preceptum Prioris, 2s. Rob'o de Midelton, servienti Regis ad arma, super carpentaria meremii apud Novum Castr. pro Castro de Dunbarr, 4li. adhuc infra. Stephano de Bytterle, servienti Regis ad arma, custodienti Barreras ante hostium Aule die Dominica prox. post festum Epiphanie, quo die d'ns Episcopus epulabatur cum Priore, 6s. 8d. per Terrar. Eidem Stephano custodienti dictas Barreras die Sancti Cuthberti in Marcio,
6s. 8d. per Terrar. In 6 par. cyrot. emp. ad dand. diversis, 12d. Joh'i de Eure de dono ne ulterius inter∣poneret de decima feni de Wascropheued, 6s. 8d. Magistro Will'o Coco Ep'i, de dono Prioris, pro labore suo quando Ep'us epulabatur cum Priore, 13s. 4d. [In dono 12 Jurans (sic) qui fuerunt in Inquisicione inter Ep'm et Priorem de Mora de Heworth, 53s. 4d.] Erased. Menestrallis de dono eodem die, 20s. Rob. de Midelton, servienti Regis ad arma, de dono ne faceret succidere ligna in le Haynyng' pro obsidione Castri de Dunbarr, 13s. 4d. (Quinque) provisoribus Regis de dono, cuilibet eorum 5s., 25s.

Exp. nec. In expensis et donis d'ni Joh'is Fossour versus Staumford ad Pascha ad Curiam Regis pro negocio domus, 100s. In expen. Bursarii, hominum, et equorum suorum eundo versus nundinas Sci. Both'i hoc anno pro providencia facienda et emenda de garderoba et aliis necessariis, ibidem morando et redeundo, 4li. 16s. 6d. ob. qa. In cordis emp. pro providencia ligandi et trussandi, 2s. 2d. In portagio de Stockfissh de nundinis usque ad domos nostras ibidem, 18d. ob. In packagio pannorum et aliarum providenciarum, et in portagia eorundem de domibus nostris ibidem usque ad Batellum, 4s. 2d. Et in Batillagio pro providencia ducenda de Sco. Both'o usque Pontem Burgi, 15s. 8d. Et in fretto navis conducte ad ducend. Stokfissh de Sco. Both'o usque Novum Castrum super Tynam, 8s. Et in expen. Burs. apud dictum Novum Castrum per duos dies circa dictos Stokfissh recipiend. de navi, et cartand. ad cariand. domi, 4s. 6d. Et in exp. Burs. (etc.) usque Scm. Both'm post festum Sci. Mich'is ad solvend. Mercator. partem pecunie sibi debite pro providencia predicta, 40s. 5d. Et in exp. Terrar. Burs. Celerar. Senescalli et Instaurarii et secum existencium ad Nundinas de Derlington ad emend. Lardar', 10s. 5d. ob. Item subvic. Ebor. pro viridi cera, 42s. Ade de Wauton subvic. Northumbr. pro viridi cera, 40s. Ballivis Ep'i pro quadam piscaria de Sunder∣land, 8s. Vic. Dunelm. de fine d'ni Prioris pro secta Curie pro Edmundbyres, 3s. 4d. In defensione cause Cf., Scrip. Tres. 105. coram d'no Archiepiscopo Ebor. diversis vicibus, 13s. 4d. In expen. Clericorum d'ni Archiep. apud Aluerton per duas vices, vidz. in visitacione et correccione, 20s. In expensis Clericorum ad parliamenta per tres annos, 20s. In uno portiphorio emp. pro ecclesia de Aluerton precepto
Prioris, 20d. In expen. Terrar. Burs. et Senescalli, Rogeri de Blaykeston, Thome de Seton, et aliorum de consilio d'ni Prioris, apud Wardley, diebus Mercurii, Jovis, et Veneris prox. post fest. Invencionis Sancte Crucis, morando ibidem ad interessend. capcioni Inquisi∣cionis inter Ep'm et Priorem de quodam vasto in mora de Heworth, eo quod die Jovis predicto, quo die Inquisicio predicta capta fuit, et cecinit Sic; cecidit seems to be meant. pro parte Prioris, d'ns Thomas Surteys et plures alii de patria, et similiter illi de Inquisicione, fuerunt in prandio apud Wardeley, 37s. In expen. d'nor. Ric'i de Whiteworth, Will'i de Gysburn, et Joh'is de Norton, apud Norton, die humacionis Ric'i de Parco de Blaykeston, 2s. 10d. In redempcione facta pro Barell' ferrat. et sportulis rehabendis de Panetario et Butelario Regis quando presenta missa fuerunt d'no Regi per adventus suos apud Dunelm. per vices, 3s. 10d. In 1 Antiphonario cum spalterio, ympnario, et Collectario, emp. de Joh'e de Castrobernardi pro eccl. de Akley, 33s. 4d. Falcatoribus ad potum, 6d. Cuidam pro factura 8 albarum et 2 superpellic. et 5 amuciarum, 4s. 5d. In dono hominibus qui salvarunt (sic) et reduxerunt Batellum vidz. le Stanbate, quando asportabatur per cretivam aque, 8d. In gumme empt. de Alano de Communia per dominum J. de Butterwyk pro cera viridi facienda pro sigillo Prioris, 20d. In factura Nattorum de Gloy pro Refectorio, 2s. 6d. In linea tela, Skeles, et ernyng' emp. pro dayeria de Beurep., 3s. 7d. In uno hanaperio emp. pro literis et acquiet. imponend., 4d. In 4xx picheris luteis emp. pro eodem festo, S. Cuthb. in Marcio. 3s. In 20 uln. linee tele emp. pro Nappronis die quo Ep'us comedit cum Priore, 5s. Subvic. Northumbr. de dono ut favorabiliter exequeretur brevia tangencia Priorem et Conv., 26s. 8d.

DIV3.P: Debita. D'no Joh'i Fossour pro expen. suis circa prosecucionem factam ad curiam Regis ad impetrand. Cartam Regis de 40 libr. redd. dat. per Regem Priori et Conventui Dunelm. de exit. ville Berewici, 70s. Joh'i de Cotes pro una hucea pro palefrido dato d'ne Regine, 6s.

DIV2.HEAD: 1336. Vend. Decimarum.

c. 1337. A porlion of a roll in which is mentioned "anni, etc., '36." This roll, like some of the others, has dots against the several entries, showing that it has been examined and ticked off by some one.
c. 1337. A roll much injured by wet.
DIV2.P: Rec. 40s. de tanno vend. de parco de Beurep'.

Garderoba. In 6 uln. de Aylsam empt. pro Priore apud Scm. Bot'lm, 18d. Furrur. albi Buggeti pro supertunicis, prec. cujuslibet, 3s. In pannis de Burneto, de Tanneto, de Melleto, et 3 radiatis pro vallectis; in 6 uln. de Begyno radiato pro roba Will'i Couper, 12s. In 2 aquariis argenteis factis pro Priore, 4li. 9d. In uno circulo argenteo pro Mazer Prioris, 9s. In 1 Cas emp. pro vasis argent. d'ni Prioris, videl't pro pelvibus et chargeours, 12s. Gilberto Lorymer pro ligacione unius Cas pro Cupa Prioris, 2s. 6d. Galfrido Shethar pro 1 cas pro 2 picher arg. d'ni Prioris, 9s. Gilb. Lorymer pro ligacione ejusdem, 3s.

Exp. min. Cuidam garcioni conducto ad eundum usque Insulam Sacram cum d'no Will'o de Charlton, 12d. Cuidam garcioni eunti ad procurator. de Norham pro Cuniculis querend. contra diem Dominicam prox. post fest. Epiphanic, quo die d'ns Ep'us epulabatur cum d'no Priore in Abbathia, 12d. In battilagio apud Hertilpole quando Burs. ivit ibidem pro pisce emendo contra festum Sci. Cuthberti in Marcio, 2d. In 8s. (sic) compotoriorum emp. pro scaccario Bursarii, 16d. In una legenda empt. per d'nm Priorem pro eccl. de Akleye, 15s. In uno haken' conducto de Will'o de Couton usque Insulam Sacram, 2s.

Structura domorum. (A very long account relating to many different places and works). Cuidam mulieri facienti mortarium et servienti Cementar. facient. furnum apud Mukling', 17d. In expen. factis circa structuram novi Buteracii ad Corneram porte Abbathie hoc anno, 16li. 3s. 10d.
In dorso. Nota, infra Stilo (sic) Expense Necessarie, de viijs. solut. pro una piscaria in Sunderland.

DIV2.HEAD: c. 1337. A roll in very bad condition; the head is gone, but 1337 and remains of other dates are written on the back. Years '35 and '36 are mentioned.
DIV2.P: D'no Joh'i Fossour pro expen. suis eundo usque Ebor. pro negoc. domus, 15s. Cuidam consanguineo ejusdem pro exp. suis eundo usque Lincoln' pro negoc. domus, 10s. In 1 pari sotularium pro Thoma fatuo. Magistro Rogero Cementario et duobus garcionibus suis sculpantibus lapides pro quodam Buteracio ad Corneram capellae supra portam Abbathie de novo construend., 108s. 2d. In omnimodis expensis factis circa emendacionem Lotorii Conventus in Claustro, 10li. 9s. 4d. Cuidam cooperienti super domum turbarum per 13 dies per vices, 4s. 4d.
Soulsilver. Gilberto Scot garcioni Regis Scocie perhendinanti in Maneriis cum 1 equo dicti Regis, per preceptum Prioris, cap. per diem 2d., 12s. 11d.

DIV2.HEAD: Comp. fr. Roberti de Middelham, 1338-9.
DIV2.P: Summa Rec. preter. arr., 1616li. 19s. 11d.
cum arr., 1776li. 10s. 11d.

Garderoba. In quadam porcione de porpays empt. apud Hawthorn pro Priore. In uno cipho de Murro empt. pro Priore. In duabus cupis argent. cum pedibus empt. pro Priore. In duobus lotoriis argent.; et in uno salario argent. pro eodem; in uno cas pro eodem; in 6 coclear. argent. fractis de novo factis; (pitchers and dishes "de stanno"; pairs of knives, 3½ doz. of knives, 3 doz. gloves for presents, "mantica pro garderoba Prioris," various saddles, boots, wick, spices, "3 lb. flor. Kanell," rice, etc., "pro Priore"). Prices decayed away.

Marescalcia. (993 horse-shoes). Et in 1300 frostnaill empt. prec. mill. 2s. 6d. Et in panno empt. pro huceis pro 6 pullanis et in eisdem consuendis, 8s. 9d. In 2 huceis quarum una de Blanketo et alia de Canabo, uno freno et uno supercingulo empto pro palefrido dato Cardinali, 4s.
Exp. d'ni Prioris per Maneria. The Prior was frequently at Pittington for long periods, e.g., "morando ibidem continue circa structuram nove camere per 7 septimanas et tres dies."
Exp. Bursarii. E.g., apud Novum Castrum ad loquendum cum Maiore de lana capta apud Norham ad opus Regis, 14d.
Dona et exenn. Prioris. To several "istriones" and "menestralli," "nuncii," and "garciones," as usual.

Exp. nec. In exp. d'ni Joh'is Fossour eundo ad d'nm Regem pro negoc. domus, 4li. Et in reparacione flodeyatorum in parco de Beurep., 3s. 4d. Et Petro Austyn et sociis suis cementariis pro factura Crucium super Marchiam inter Ep'm et Priorem in mora de Heworth, 30s. 4d. Et in libris et aliis ornamentis emp. pro ecclesia de Estryngton, et in reparacione diversorum defectuum cancelli ejusdem ecclesie, 4li. 5s. Et in uno muro luteo faciendo circa pomerium de Billingham, 20s. Et in 6 cignis campestr. vidz. Ewes empt., 9s. Et in 4or aucis rosatis empt., 22d. Et in pice et bitumine empt. pro le Stanbat', 8d. Et mulieribus portantibus aquam de Were usque ad Abbatiam pro pistrina, Bracina, et Coquina per diversas vices quando pipa gelidata fuit, 8s. Et in uno pari sotularium empt. pro Thoma fatuo, 8d.

Structura domorum. In exp. factis circa structuram unius novi molendini ventritici apud Hesilden, 108s. 5d.; do. circa structuram alterius novi Buteracii ad supponend. Corneram Capelle supra portam Abbathie, 48s. 6d.

(Focale). In exp. factis circa petas in Yvesmosse in parco de Beurep. fodiend. portand. siccand. et rickland. hoc anno pro focali, In peteria de Beaurep. pro focali pro Abbathia (Dupl. Roll). 53s. 7d.

DIV2.HEAD: 1338-9. A roll which seems to be a rough draught of the last; the head is illegible. The dates '38 and '39 are mentioned. It affords some interesting variations, viz.:—
DIV2.P: Garderoba. In 4 uln. burelli scacciati emp. pro garnemento Thome Fole per preceptum Prioris, 4s. 4d. In 15 uln. panni diversi coloris emp. in Nundinis Dunelm. pro caligis inde faciendis pro donis d'ni Prioris, 26s. This item is in the other roll.

Exp. nec. Mulieribus portantibus aquam pro bracina et pistrina et coquina in septimana post festum Puri∣ficacionis eo quod pipa fuit gelidata, 6s. In aqua wyndanda de fonte tracticio in claustro ad idem, et pro opere circa pipam, 16d. In mundacione fontis infra Abbathiam, 2s.

DIV2.HEAD: Comp. ejusdem, 1339-40.
DIV2.P:
Garderoba. In factura unius novi Clathseck cum Barehud pro d'no Priore cum braces ad idem, 5s. In
1 Chalone emp. pro Lecto Prioris, 15s. Item in panno emp. in foro Dunelm. pro uno garniamento pro Thoma fatuo, 3s. 6d. Item 8d. Et in una Cupa argent. deaurat. cum pede emp. pro priore, 55s.

Dona et exenn. Prioris. Cuidam paupercule mulieri de Scocia nunc' Roberto de Cotom, 2s. Piscatori Joh'is de Clerevaux, 12d. Butelario Ducis Cornub., 6s. 8d. Willelmo Piper istrioni d'ni Rad'i de Neuill die Circumcis., 40d. Cursori Ducis Cornub. deferenti literas Priori et Conventui de providendo et inveniendo quandam Navem pro guerra Regis, 3s.

Exp. nec. In uno parvo Batello emp. apud Hertilpole pro piscaria d'ni Prioris, 10s. Item in 1 petra picis ad idem, 10d. In 1 cera et 3 capistris emp. pro equis Carrecte cariantis buscam, 6d. Joh'i Scot fabro pro ligatura unius paris Rotarum pro uno Kare pro lignis cariand. ad stagnum Molendini Abbathie, 13s. 4d. Thome fatuo pro sotular., 4d. In exp. Burs. et Sen. apud Novum Castrum et Wardeley diebus Mercurii et Jovis prox. post festum Translacionis Sci. Benedicti ad loquend. cum subvicecom. Northumbr. de retorna brevium tangencium Priorem et Conventum quoad pens. concessam per Regem pro Farne, 9s. 4d. ob. In dono eidem subvic. ut favora∣bilius exequeretur et retornaret dicta brevia et alia Priorem et Conventum tangencia, 10s. Thome fatuo pro sotular., 5d. Petro clerico de Fery pro terra in campo de Fery ubi nunc est Minera carbonum ab eodem empta, 22li. In clausura de parys Query pars, young salmon, confined within some enclosure? apud Ketton de muro novo et in veteribus vivariis The "vetus vivarium de Ketton" occurs in 1272.—Feodarium 156n. ibidem mundandis et novis vivariis faciendis, 30s. Magistro Infirmarie ad pytanciam die Sci. Andr., 2s. Mulieribus operantibus ad pipam, 21d. In 6 tankardis ferro ligand. pro camera Prioris, 2s. Item 12 mulieribus portantibus aquam pro bracina per 5 dies quia pipa fracta fuit, 5s. In duabus magnis cordis factis apud Novum Castrum pro pipa wyndanda et pro aliis diversis operibus cum necesse fuerit, 13s. 6d. D'no Joh'i Fossour pro exp. suis eundo London. ad parliamentum ad prosequend. et promovend. negoc. domus de Coldingham, 6li. 13s. 4d. Item 20s. Ric'o Disshere pro exp. suis et unius equi eundo apud Ebor. ad providend. et emend. sturgon' et lampred. pro festo Sci. Cuthb. in Marcio, 2s. Et in exp. d'nor. Camerar. Sacriste, Hostillarii, et Bursarii in prandio apud Hesilden in die Mercurii prox. post fest.
Sci. Cuthb. in Marcio redeundo de Ellewyk de humacione d'ni Will'i de Kilkenny militis, 3s. 8d. Et in exp. valectorum Prioris venantibus apud Mukling' contra Pascha, 5s. Et in expen. Thome Ruter eundo usque Ebor. ad solvend. denar. vic. Ebor. de viridi cera, 5s. Et in reparacione Archie stagni de Fery, 22s. 7d. Et in vivariis de novo factis apud Pytingdon, 16s. 1d. Et in exp. Terrar. Burs. et Instaurarii apud Beurep. ad signacionem instauri, 3s. 5d. ob.

Structura domorum. Tho. Harper et 4 sociis suis Carpen. super reparacione del Pethous per 1 ebd., 7s. 10d. Pro reparacione Camere Hospicii juxta portam Abbathie, etc., 43s. 6d. In structura gabelli cancelli eccl. de Acley in omnibus custagiis, cum opere vitreo, 9li. 17s. 11d. Item querrerario et cementario frangentibus et sculpantibus petram pro alio butraco ad corneram capelle supra portam Abb'ie infra tempus hujus compoti, 79s. 5d.

Empcio focalis. In petis tassand. in Yvesmosse, 7s. Et in 22 carratis petarum cariand. de ibid. usque Abb'iam pro carrat. 4d., 7s. 4d. Portanti buscam de aqua usque in Abb'iam, 14d. Item 23d. Item 12d. Item 8d. Item 8d. Pro 25 carrat. busce car. de parco de Beaurep. contra Natale, pro carrat. 7d., 14s. 7d.; do. de bosco de Eluet.

DIV2.HEAD: 1339. A fragment so endorsed in an old hand, almost wholly illegible.
1340(-41)? A roll so dated on the back in an old hand; the head is obliterated by wet.
DIV2.P: Summa Rec. preter Arr., 1931li. 14s. 4d. ob. qa.
cum Arr., 2139li. 9s. 9d. ob. qa.
Garderoba. In 4 ulnis panni emp. pro Thoma fatuo, 4s.
Empcio vini. In 1 pipa vini de Rina emp. de Rob'to de Castro, 7li.
Marescalcia. Ml frostenaill, 2s. 6d.

Exp. Prioris per Maneria. In expensis ejusdem (Prioris) apud Pytingdon a vigilia festi Conv. S. Pauli usque in crastinum festi S. Petri in Cathedra per quatuor sept. et tres dies, 9li. 19s. 6d. qa. The last day mentioned here is Feb. 23, which in 1341 would be in the week next before Quadragesima Sunday, in which week Prior Cowton died at Pittington (Scr. Tres., 130). In expens. d'ni J. electi John Fossor was elected Mar. 16 and installed Mar. 31, 1341 (Ib.).
apud Beaurep. a vigilia S. Cuthb. in Mar. usque diem Sabb. prox. seq. per 5 dies, 22s. 4d. Et in exp. ejusdem d'ni J. Prioris apud Beaurep. (S. Elpheg. ad S. Marc.) per unam ebdom. et quatuor dies, 56s. 6d. ob. Et in exp. d'ni Prioris circumeundo maneria Prioratus per 7tem dies post fest. S. Mich. Archang., As this account is from May to May, the visitation here referred to must have been made by William de Cowton. visis particulis traditis per d'nm W. de Skaresbrek, terrarium, 73s. 2d.

Exp. nec. Rogero de Whassyngton constabulario de Rychemond pro redempcione cujusdam monachi de Dunfermelyn incarcerati apud Rychemond, 10li. Et in structura unius domuncule lapidee supra le Welleheued, 23s. 6d. Et ballivis Burgi de Sunderland pro fixura vararum in Were, 8s. Et subvic. Northumbr. pro favore habendo in negociis d'nm Priorem tangentibus, 13s. 4d. Et in gruello emp. pro potagio Conventus per vices, 4s. 5d. Et in corda empta pro pipa liganda per diversas vices, 14d. Et in aqua portanda ad Bracinam per diversas vices, 9s. 4d. Et Thome Harper et sociis suis, Carpentariis, pro factura Hercie Prioris, cum clavis empt. et sarracione meremii ad eandem, 19s. Et in 8xxli. cere, li. 6d. empt. pro luminar. circa corpus . . Dots in the MS. Prioris, 4li. Et in lichino emp. ad idem, 5s. 6d. ob. Et in factura ejusdem luminar., 6s. 8d. Et in oblacionibus die humacionis d'ni . . Dots in the MS. Prioris, 6s. 8d. Et Hugoni de Schirewode et sociis suis, Cemen∣tariis, pro factura Tumuli Prioris, 6s. Et in expens. d'ni Joh'is Fossour eundo ad Ep'm ad petend. licenciam eligendi . . Dots in the MS. Priorem, 4li. 6s. 8d. Et Joh'i de Colby pro expensis suis usque London ad certificand. d'nm Ep'm de electione Prioris, 20s. Et in 2 sigillis novis factis pro d'no Joh'e Priore, 13s. 8d. Et cuidam de Suthstreft (sic) Wlnerato per homines de Abathia, 6s. 8d. Et in exp. d'ni J. Fossour versus Houeden, ad loquend. cum D'no Ep'o, 20s. Et in curtinis pro lecto d'ni Prioris et aliis necessariis empt. pro eodem, 75s. 4d. ob.

Exp. minute. Et cuidam deferenti literas Prioris usque Insulam sacram, in vigilia Nat. Sci. Joh'is, 12d. Et cuidam eunti apud Mukelingeswyk ad premuniend. Instaurarium ibidem de elongando Instaurum, per metum Invasionis Scottorum . . MS. obliterated by wet. Et cuidam deferenti literas Prioris ad Priorem Stanford de essendo procur. Prioris ad generale Capitulum apud Norhampton . . MS. obliterated by wet. Et cuidam deferenti literas citatorias usque Whelpington ad citandum
Johannem de Herle, 6d. Et Roberto Scot, nuncio . . Dots in the MS. Prioris pro exp. suis eundo versus Ebor. post festum Purif. ad solvend. den. Will'o de Wa . . MS. obliterated by wet. et Joh'i de Allagby, 18d. Et eidem Roberto eundo die Martis in carniprivio ad explorand. ubi tunc fuit Ep'us Dunelm. ut posset certiorare d'nos Joh'em Fossour et Nich'm de Lusceby Nuncios Supprioris et Conventus missos versus d'cm Ep'm ad querend. licenciam eligendi . . MS. obliterated by wet. Et diversis cursoribus deferentibus literas supplicatorias Supprioris et Conventus ad Abbates, Priores, et milites, de inter∣essendo . . . MS. obliterated by wet. Et diversis cursoribus deferentibus literas Suppr. et Capituli ad premuniend. et citand. fratres ad Cellas et Commorantes . . . MS. obliterated by wet. de essendo celebracioni electionis novi Prioris, 8s. Et cuidam cursori eunti usque Wodestok ad d'nm . . Dots in the MS. Ep'm cum literis Suppr. et Cap. supplicatoriis ut Magistro E . . . MS. obliterated by wet. Haward Custodi Abathie tempore vacacionis per dictum Ep'm deputato mandaret ne quicquam in prejudicium Supprioris . . . MS. obliterated by wet. seu contra eorum privilegia aliqualiter attemptaret, 4s. Et cuidam deferenti literas novi Prioris ad Priorem de Lythum in quindena Pasch., 2s. Et Roberto Scot deferenti literas Prioris usque Coldingham eadem vice, 18d. Et eidem Roberto deferenti literas Prioris usque Ebor. die Lune prox. post festum Sci. Joh'is ante portam Latinam, 20d. Et Thome Roter pro exp. suis apud Novum Castrum per vices, 18d.

Structura domorum. Et in exp. factis in structura alterius novi Butracii ad corneram capelle supra portam Abathie hoc anno, 10li. 10s. Et in structura novi Penticii inter Cameram Prioris et Coquinam, 6li. 5s. 4d. Et in reparacione quorundam defectuum cooperture Capelle supra portam Abathie, 16s. Et Will'o Kay Cementario et 2 sociis suis et 2 hominibus sibi servientibus reparantibus fundamentum gabelli lardarii in parte exteriori per . . . MS. obliterated by wet. Et in sarracione plancorum pro le Saltehous et pro les Watrewawes molend. Abathie, 3s. 2d. Et in planks sarrand. pro le Wollehous de Pytingdon, 6s. Et cuidam Cementario reparanti murum inter Ecclesiam Beate Marie in Ballio australi Dunolm. et Abathiam, cum calce empt. pro eodem . . . MS. obliterated by wet.
Emp. foc. Et in busca portanda de aqua usque in Abathiam per diversas vices, 6s. 3d.
Summa omn. Exp., 1803li. 11s. 8d. qa.

DIV2.HEAD: c. 1341? A headless roll for Term. Pent., dated 1341? on wrapper.
DIV2.P: Garderoba. In 1 furura nigra pro Capucio Prioris, 3s. 9d. In 60 Stokfisshe Leenges emp. de Alano de Communia, 13s. 3d. qa.

Marescalcia. In Canabo empt. pro 1 Provandpok et 2 Huciis pro equis Prioris, etc., 3s. In 1 pari de bag∣sadiltres, 12d. In 2 par. de feteres cum seruris pro equis del Wodkart, 14d. Item 1d. In sep. et all. empt. pro marescalcia equorum Prioris, 4d. In Traynels factis pro equis d'ni Prioris, 8d. In 1 traynell empt. pro equo Burs., 4d.

Exp. min. In exp. garcionis Hostillarii versus Oxon. cum 1 equo ad querendum D'nm W. de Hawtwisill, 3s. In exp. T. Lascell et Ade de Ludword fugiencium cum pullan. ultra Teysam pro Scotis, 3s. 4d. In exp. R. Scot nuncii versus Lond. et ibi morando per 20 dies pro equo accomodato Waltero de Geerlay Maceuero (Massuerio) Macebearer. d'ni Regis querendo, 12s. 4d.

DIV2.HEAD: 1341-2. A headless roll in which '41 is mentioned.
DIV2.P: Garderoba. In 5 garniamentis emp. pro pagiis et Thoma fatuo, 16s. 4d.
Exp. minute. In exp. Rob'i Scot versus Carliolum et querentis Vicecomitem Dunelm. pro Thoma Harper incarcerato, 2s. 1d.
(The entries extracted from the roll 1341, Term. Mart., next below, are included in this one).

DIV2.HEAD: 1341. A headless roll for Term. Mart. (A payment for '41 is mentioned).
DIV2.P: Garderoba. In Russeto emp. pro Bedmen "Pauperibus" in some rolls. domus Dei et Werkmen Curie, 55s. 7d. In uno Qwhylt emp. pro lecto Prioris, 12s. (Galanga and other spices.)

Empc. Bras. In 2 qart. ord. emp. de proposito de Wlveston et liberat. Joh'i servienti de Billingham ad infundend. in bras., 8s. In 317 lagenis Cervise emp. tempore quo faciebant les Greenledes, lag. 1d., 31s. 5d. In Infusione 15 qart. ord. et qart. aven. Maner. de Hoghall in bras. per W. de Duxfeld et Alic. Sclater, 3s. 9d.

Marescalc. In 1 freno emp. pro palefrido dato d'no Regi, 2s. In uno Huce pro eodem emp. et pro factura ejusdem, 7s. 4d. ob. In 1 sella emp. ad domand. pullanos, 20d. In canabo et panno laneo emp. ad 2 huces pro eisdem, 3s. 10d. In Marescalcia eorundem, 2d. In atramentis et gummis emp. pro equis redeuntibus de Scocia et pro le Baghors, 11d. ob. In 1 freno emp. pro le Stedisone, 16d. In 5 Reynes emp. pro capistris longe carecte, 2d. In Traynell' factis pro le Steddisone et alio equo Prioris, 7d.

Exp. Prioris ad Maneria. Beaurepair. In diversis exp. et dona Prioris factis per Capellanum, The first mention of the Prior's Chaplain acting as his paymaster. See Rites, p. 85. ut patet per particulas, 15s. 8d. Wardeley, do., 28s. 10d. ob.

Exp. fr. ad Cellas. In sol. facta d'no Ric'o Harpyn versus Oxon. et pro mora sua ibidem causa convalescencie recuperande, 40s. Sociis studentibus ibidem in pens. de Aluerton, 10li. D'no Ric'o de Tynemuth spacianti apud Beauiu pro salute habenda, 2s.
Dona et exenn. Joh'i de Garton per Priorem, 6s. 8d. Tribus aliis ministris iniquitatis, 10s. Sagittar. Regis, 3s. 4d. Pelidod et duobus sociis suis histrionibus d'ni Regis post Natale d'ni, 10s.

Exp. nec. In exp. d'ni Thome de Scouland deferentis vexillum Sci. Cuthb. versus Scociam, 7li. 13s. 4d. In 2 novis Sestres factis de novo pro bracina, 20d. Burgo de Sunderland pro Ebyare, 8s. In Paknedel et Paktrede emp. pro lana pakkanda, 8d. Cuidam socio vicario Bursarii in Ecclesia, 20d. In uno panno de serico emp. pro frontello Ecclesie de Estrington, 9s. In expen. factis per bursarium apud Hoghall pro mundacione aque de Were, 13s. 1d. ob. In exp. factis circa muracione aque ductus ad mineram de Fery, per firmarium ejusdem per tempus comp., 14s. 8d.

Expen. minute. Cuidam munienti bursarium elongare le Wodcart, ne caperetur per ministros Regis, 2d. Willelmo de Whiteley eunti cum vexillo, 6d. In exp. ejusd. (Rob. Scot, nuncii) apud Novum Castrum et alibi, D'no Rege et magnatibus existentibus in partibus borialibus ad Natale D'ni, 2s. 6d. In exp. cujusdam euntis ad Ebor. et reducentis unum equum accomodatum Comiti de Derby, 12d.
Structura domorum. In 6 M 300 Sponbrod Ca 4d. In 2 M de Spone fac. in parco de Mukl. pro molendino abathie, 14s.

DIV2.HEAD: 1342-3. A headless roll with a headless duplicate. The dates '42 and '43 are mentioned.
DIV2.P: Structura domorum. In Saylwandis emp. et aliis reparac. factis in molend. de Hesilden, 24s. In 1 poste faciend. et ponend. sub Cancell. de Billingham, 12d.

DIV2.HEAD: c. 1343? Terms Mart. and Pent. A headless roll, dated only on wrapper.
DIV2.P: Garderoba. In 5 garniament. empt. pro fatuo et pagiis, 13s. 7d. In Torchiis et torticiis emp. de Hasti∣ludiator', 15s. In 1 pari calcarium emp. pro Priore, 6d. In furruris faciend. de pellibus propriorum agnorum mortuorum, 6s.

Marescalc. In emend. Sellar. del Langcart' et Sum∣mariorum Prioris, 6s. 1d. In 64 capistris, 45 paribus trahiciorum, et 11 Carterapes, cum 6 Coler', 1 pari de Bates, Query pack-saddles; see N.E.D., s.v. Bat. 4or Rercordes, 3 Reyns, 3 paribus de pastrons, 3 Schakles et 1 croper pro longa carecta, 26s. 9d. In flokes emp. pro sellis implend., 16d. In 14 petr. feodi Coquine emp. pro uncto carectarum, 8s. 2d.
Exp. Prioris per Maneria. Exp. exequiarum uxoris Marmeduci de Lomley, 6li. 9s.
Dona et exen. Prioris. Christmas presents of knives and gloves to the Bishop's clerks and valecti, 18s. 6d. Several presents to various players (Istriones).

DIV2.HEAD: c. 1343? A headless roll containing mainly the same entries as the last; it looks like a rough draught.
DIV2.P: Marescalc. In 4 frenis emp. pro pullanis domitand., 3s. 5d. In emend. del. langcartsadill et 4 Wambtowes de Coreo factis, 16d.

Structura domorum. In 1 pari de Trindelis emp., 2 Milnyrenes, 2 Spindels, 2 Ryndes fac. de proprio ferro pro Molend. de Scaltok, 2s. 4d. ob. In una fenestra pro gabello capelle supra portam vitreanda partim de novo et residuo reparando, 28s. 8d. In aqua portanda per mulieres quia pipa fracta, 12s. 1d.

DIV2.HEAD: Comp. fr. Roberti de Benton, 1344-5. (With an unfinished duplicate).
DIV2.P: Garderoba. (Includes not only large purchases of cloths and of furs, but of fish and spices, dried fruits, etc.). In Russet empt. pro Bedemen' Werkemen' Pag' et Thoma fatuo, 4li. 8s. 6d.
Empcio Bras. et Cervise. In 257 lag. cervise emp. in villa ad diversa precia, 30s. 2d. ob. qa.

Marescalc. In uno freno empt. pro albo palefrido dato d'no Ep'o, uno freno emp. pro palefridis d'ni Prioris adequandis, et duobus frenis pro pullanis, 5d. In harnasiis litere d'ni Ep'i defuncti empt. pro longa carecta, 5s. In 7 correis equinis et stircinis de instauro de Beaurpaire mortuis in morina dealbandis pro harnas. carectar., 3s. In axacione longe carecte per vices, 7d.
Dona Pr. et ex. Nuncio Electi nuncianti con∣secracionem ejus esse prorogandam, 2s. In 2 Aluers et 20 paribus cyrotecarum emp., 10s.
Exp. Prioris ad Maneria. In exp. ejusdem usque Sherburn in Elmet ad Electum et redeundo tam in donis datis extraneis quam propriis servientibus, 10li. 3s.

Elemosina consueta. Pauperibus de domo Dei pro calceamentis et focali, 9s. Pauperibus die Cene, 102s. 8d. Famulis Curie ex consuetudine ad Natale D'ni, 25s. 6d. In Elemosina Prioris per tempus compoti preter computata per capellanum, 50s. 8d.

Structura domorum. In 7 Melis emp. pro Bracina et 14 Rigaldis, 5s. 9d. In soudynghyrnes empt. pro Plumbar., 6d. In Girthetres "Girthtrees" in the other copy. empt. pro vas. Cellarii et Bracine, 4s. 6d.
Summa omn. Exp., 1339li. 9s. 4d. ob.
Exc. rec. Exp. in 104li. 19s. 9d.

DIV2.HEAD: 1344? The following passage occurs in Raine's "St. Cuthbert," p. 105:—
DIV2.P: "I find in the Bursar's Roll, or great roll of yearly accounts for the year 1344, a curious entry, which may be thus translated:—
"To divers persons for carrying letters from the Prior to the chief men (proceribus) of the Bishoprick, soliciting them to be present at the feast of St. Cuthbert in March, 6d."
There seems to be some mistake here, as I have not been able to find the passage, and the payment is surely inadequate.—ED.

DIV2.HEAD: Vend. decimarum de autumno, 1345.
Per quos Compoti fr. Tho. de Stokton, 1347-8 (cum dupl.).
DIV2.P: Varia Recepta. 20li. rec. de dono d'ni Prioris super structura cujusdam nove grangie apud Estryngton. 13li. 3s. 11d. ob. qa. rec. de minera carbonum de Raynton. 10s. 5d. do. de Fery. 30s. de tractibus recium apud le Sheles. 79s. 10d. ob. de salmon. provent. de piscacione ibidem. (Many receipts from sale of pigeons at various manors).
Summa Rec. preter Rem. et arr., 1587li. 12d. qa.
cum Rem. et arr., 1771li. 17s. 1d. qa.

Garderoba. In pannis pro militibus et clericis, vallectis, servientibus officiorum, garcionibus, prec. panni, 36s., 26s. 8d., 24s. Rusett pro bedemannis, operariis in Curia, et houces equor. ad diversa precia. In 1 panno empt. pro pagiis et Thoma fatuo, 18s. 1d. Many more purchases of textiles, furs, sugar, spices, rice, fruit, oil, fish, wax, etc. Et in 2 pannis de Wirsted empt. pro usu Prioris, 20s.

Empcio vini. In 8 doleis vini empt. apud Hull cum fretto navis pro eisdem ducendis usque Novum Castrum, cum oliag. portag. stouag. gaugea, et aliis exp. factis circa eadem, 33li. 6s. 8d. (Other purchases).
Marescalcia. Harness and wheels "pro le Wodecart." Et in 6 par. de Pastronnes novis empt. et aliis emend. pro equis Prioris, 13d. ob.
Dona Prioris. "Istrionibus," etc., as usual, and to king's "provisor," etc. Cuidam portanti unam cupam argenteam d'no Priori de dono d'ni Rad'li de Neuill, 3s. 4d.

Exp. nec. In exp. factis in Ryddyng stagni de Fery et Feryclyff, 5s. In expens. Thome Fossour senioris conducentis d'nos Will'm de Ramesay et Patricium de Dunbar versus Marchiam, 4s. 6d. In 2li. rubee cere emp. pro sigill. Prioris, 2s. In ernyng et cheseclathis et vasis emptis pro dayaria de Beaurep', This entry occurs constantly. 3s. 6d. In 200 circulis
emptis pro cuvis et doleis circulandis, 5s. 8d. In 1 thuribulo empt. pro ecclesia de Heghyngton, 2s. 6d., 1 superpelliceo pro eadem, 3s., 1 thuribulo pro Meryngton, 20d., 1 processionario pro eadem, 2s. In 7 doliis vini vacuis empt. de pincerna Prioris pro diversis vasis pro bracina et aliis inde faciendis, 7s. In aqua portanda pro bracina per vices quia pipa fracta, 4s. 6d. Burgo de Sunderland pro Ebbeyar in Were, 8s. In 1 securi emp. pro lignis signandis in parco de Mukling' et alibi, 12d. In 2 cignis empt. apud Ebor. quando Abbas de Sco. Albano epulabatur cum Priore apud Beaurep', 10s. In emendacione del Stanebate et del Fisshebate, 4s. 2d. In exp. Will'i de Whalton per tempus compoti circueundo ad tenend. capitula in Werehalshyr, cum equis conducendis pro eodem per vices, et omn. exp. garcionum pereuncium ad premuniend. capitula, et cum pergameno empto, 9s. 11d.

Exp. Minute. Will'o Hostiario pro exp. suis piscando in Mordon Kerr pro pikes capiend., 20d. In ligacione et reparacione 1 psalterii pro eccl. de Pityngton, 9d. In 3 faldis locatis in vico Sci. Egidii tempore Nundin. Dunelm. pro equicio de Beaurepair ibidem vendend., 5s. Hominibus auxiliantibus ad fugandum dictum equicium ad faldam eadem vice, 18d. [Exp. nec. Pro 16 perticat. muri terr. factis apud le Horsehouse in parco de Beaurepair, pro perticata, 8d.] Misplaced in the account. In cirpis falcand apud Beaurep. pro camera Prioris per vices, 10d. In 2 Cestris novis fact. et ferro ligand. pro bracina, 2s. 10d. Cuidam capienti Ratones infra Abbathiam per vices, 18d. In 3 sarpleriis novis consuendis et 8 veter. emendand. cum filo empt. pro lano paccando, 10d. (To persons carrying letters, to Holy Island, 6d.; Eastrington, 2s.; Newcastle, 2d.; Bedlington, 7d.; Jedburgh, 12d.).

Structura domorum. In expen. factis in structura nove capelle de Wyuestowe, ut in carpentar. nil hic, quia precomputatur; cementar', 105s. 1d., sclattar. 13s., cum reparacione diversarum domorum infra domum manerium, 14s. 6d., et 41 petr. 9 lb. ferri pro barris, crokes, ligami∣nibus, et aliis ferramentis ad dictam capellam, cum fabricacione eorundem, 17s. 5d. Et Waltero Vitriario pro fenestris vitreis ejusdem capelle, 66s. 9d., 10li. 16s. 9d. In flakes et Skaffaldyng pro opere ejusdem capelle, 15d. Magistro Infirmarie super structura Infirmarie per unam Indenturam, 4li. 10s., preter 280 petras plumbi. Eidem pro celyng Infirmarie extra Indenturam, 2s. In reparacione
molendini de Wyuestow, 3s. 2d. ob. (also of Ferry and Skaltok mills). Alano Sclatter operanti infra curiam et extra in diversis maneriis preter Wyuestowe, 52s. 5d. (Slates, boards, laths, iron work, tools, etc.).
Focale. In 314 travis bruere eradicand. in mora de Beaurep. pro singulis 20 trav., 8d., 12s. 6d.

Contribuciones. D'no Regi pro ecclesiis de Estrington, Aluerton, et Skypwyth, 10li. 16d.; pro proventibus infra aquas, 26li. 13s. 9d. ob. In mutuacione d'no Regi per Priorem, 6li. 13s. 4d., per breve de magno sigillo. Magistro Raymundo Pelegrini nuncio d'ni pape in Anglia per literam acquietancie de 2 annis, videlicet (mccc) xlvii et octavum, 14s. (etc.).

DIV2.HEAD: 1347. Vend. decimarum.
c. 1347. Fragment, on paper.
1348. Debita Bursarii (on a very small roll).
1348. Memorandum (on a still smaller roll, indented).
DIV2.P: Quod d'ns Tho. de Stokton Burs. recepit de d'no Will'o de Charleton Terar' de veteribus arr. (amounts follow).

DIV2.HEAD: c. 1348. An imperfect and unfinished roll in which '48 is mentioned.
DIV2.P: Garderoba. In uno panno empt. pro pagiis et Thoma fatuo, 16s. Parkariis de Raynton et del Haynyng pro garniamentis suis, 10s. Subforestario de Muklyngwyk pro garniamento suo, 4s. Subforestario parci de Acley pro garniam. suo (blank) Will'o (blank) scribenti sigill. d'ni Prioris pro garnemento suo et aliis necessariis, 6s. 2d. In 15 lb. di. zukr. de Skaffatyne lb. 2s., 31s.

Exp. nec. In exp. factis circa emendacionem aque∣ductus super Dewent juxta Muklyngwyk . . Pro retibus emp. ad usum d'ni Prioris, 3s. 4d. In meremio empt. pro circulis inde faciend. pro cuvis et doleis circulandis, 6s. 6d. Will'o Couper facienti circulos de dicto meremio ibidem quesito pro expensis suis . .
Exp. minute. Cuidam capienti corvos et picas per diversa maneria Prioratus ex precepto Prioris, . .

Structura domorum. In exp. factis in structura novarum domorum in ballio australi, videlicet in Car∣pentaria, etc., 6li. 10s. 9d. In nova structura duarum botharum super pontem de Eluet, videlicet in Carpentar., etc., 13s. 6d.

DIV2.HEAD: Comp. ejusdem, 1348-9. Some new arrangements respecting the tithes seem to have been made about this time. (Incomplete).
DIV2.P: Jarowe. Summa, 22li. 16s. 8d. Et non plus in denar. quia decima de Monketon, Heberne, Harton, et de Wyuestowe in manu Prioris, et decime de Jarowe et de Hetworthe assignantur Magistro de Jarowe.
Wermouth. Dec. de Neuton juxta Hilton, Threp∣tende, Hilton, Suthewyk, in manu Prioris; de Wermouthe, Fulwell, assignantur Magistro de Wermouthe.
Petingdon. Summa, 8li. 19s. 1d. ob. Et non plus in denar. quia decime de Northpetingdon, Southpetingdon, Hepdon, Ravensflathe intrantur in Manerio de Petingdon.
Hesilden. Summa, 6li. 10s. Et non plus in denar. quia decime de Hesilden et de Herdewyk intrantur in Manerio de Hesilden. Et de decima de Hilton respondebit J. fil. Walteri, quia trituravit.
Billingham. Et nil de decimis parochie de Billingham, quia in manu Prioris.
Acleye. Summa, 19li. 3s. 5d.
Heghington. Summa, 18li. 18s.
Merington. Summa, 6li. 10s. Et non plus in denar. quia decime de Fery et de Merington in manu Prioris. Et decima de Het assignatur domui commune.
Et nil de decima Campi juxta Houghale hoc anno quia intratur in Manerio de Houghale.
Aluerton. Summa, 17li. 5s. 11d. Et non plus in denar. quia ordeum tocius decime et residuum avene remanent in Grang. non triturata.
Estrington. 50li. rec. de Adam Byrilote et sociis suis pro garbis decimalibus parochie de Estr. sibi venditis.
Bedlington. 26li. 13s. 4d. pro dec. vend.
Bolton. Nil, quia assignatur Sacriste.
Summa vend. dec. infra aquas et extra, 176li. 17s. 5d. ob.
Summa Rec. preter Arr., 1212li. 8s. 1d.
cum Arr., 1475li. 5s. 10d. qa.

Garderoba. An account of the usual character, including 6 uln. de bluetto empt. pro servientibus maneriorum, 9s. di. panni pro pagiis d'ni Prioris et Thoma fatuo, 10s. In 6 paribus Cerothecarum empt. pro . . Priore cum fururacione unius paris Cerothecarum pro eodem, 18d. 3 libr. de Quybibbis, 9 libr. zucr. de Caffatyn, una copula de Pynyonade. In duabus libr. de Resyns sanz pepyn empt. apud Ebor., 2s. 3d. In 4 ulnis de fotmale empt. apud Ebor., 11d. In factura unius spatour pro lectuariis in garderoba Prioris de pixidibus evellendis, 5d. In emendacione unius Chardour arg. pro mensa Prioris, 16d.
Marescalc. Repairs of the "longa carecta et le Wodcarte," harness, etc.
Exp. fr'm ver. Cellas. D'no Uthredo cum uno socio student. Oxon., 13li. 10s. D'no Rob'to Marmyon versus Insulam Sacram, 5s. (Two to Stamford, 10s. each).

DIV2.HEAD: Comp. Joh. de Neuton a S. Cuthb. in Sept. ad S. Mart., 1349.
DIV2.P: Rec. De 198li. 6s. 10d. rec. de d'no Priore, ut patet per unam indenturam inde factam. Et de 50s. de feretro tempore quo J. de Neuton custodivit feretrum. Et de 2s. datis beato Cuthberto per quemdam extraneum (etc.).
Summa (totalis Rec.), 256li. 8s. 8d.
Exp. nec. D'nis Ade de Wermouthe et Rob'to de Brakenbury pro cervisia empta pro animabus fratrum defunctorum distribuenda, 7s. D'no Uthredo pro exp. suis versus Oxon. de precepto Prioris, 40s., etc.
Summa omn. Exp., 256li. 8s. 5d. qa. Et sic excedunt recepta expens. in 3d., qui con∣donatur.
Attached is the indenture relating to what Joh. de Neuton had received from the Prior (John Fossor). See Scriplores tres, 132.

DIV2.HEAD: 1349-50. A part of a roll for a year; date ascertained by balance taken on to 1350-51.
DIV2.P: Dona et exennia Prioris. In 6 vitulis empt. et missis Ep'o Dunelm. ad Natale, 15s. 10d. In obolis datis d'no Priori pro elemos. pauperibus distribuenda, 3s. 4d. Joh'i de Martyndale deferenti anguillos (sic) Priori, de presento, 6d.

Exp. nec. Cuidam capienti Rathones in Abb'ia per loca, 18d. In aqua portanda bracine per vices quia pipa fracta, 21s. 11d. In uno turibulo empto pro eccl. de Estrington et emendacione legende eccl. de Heghington, 2s. 1d. Hominibus de Raynton pro putura sua in falcacione prati de Donwell, 2s. In uno Ladil ferr., uno Plane, et aliis instrumentis pro officio plumbar. emptis, 2s. 5d. Pro pipa fracta emendanda per vices, 7s. 6d. In una sera empta pro hostio Manerii de Petingdon, cum emendacione pipe ibidem, 11d. In duabus securibus emp. pro Pistrino et ad colpandum boscum in parco de Beurp', 9d. In soluc. facta Thome de Preston pro una cista stagni de Ketton faciend. cum pilis et flakes, ac mundacione ejusdem, 16s. 4d.

Minute Exp. Ade Blount pro garniamento Thome fatui et sex Saunapis pro refectorio consuendis, 21d. In cordis emp. pro retibus d'ni Prioris ad capiendum cervos, 3s. In Scignis portandis ad diversa loca prioratus, 13d. Cuidam deferenti Heronceaus Priori, de Acley usque Dunolm., 6d. Duobus garcionibus euntibus apud Ebor. cum duobus summariis pro Harnaciis Archidiaconi inibi cariandis, 4s. 9d. In duobus Sarplers de novo consuendis et 8 veteribus emendandis, cum filo pro eisdem, 17d. Cuidam deferenti poma d'no Priori de presento, 6d. Ric'o Coteour pro tribus pullanis d'ni Prioris domandis, 10s. In falcacione prati stagni de Petingdon, 3s. 11d. In exp. Rogeri Couhird vendentis equicium de Beurep. in nundinis Dunolm. et alibi, 3s. 4d. In herbagio et faldis conductis pro dicto equicio vendendo, 7s. 2d.

Structura domorum. Joh'i Dyker ad supplendum stagnum Molendini fullonatici de Acly, ultra convencionem prius factam inter ipsum et Thomam de Stokton, nuper Bursarium, 5s. Roberto Mayson operanti super Cameram que vocatur Coldingham, 2s. In molendino fullonatico de Acley corperiendo, 4s. 6d. In juncturis, Stapils, Hupis, Gugeons, Girdils, Spykyng', et Scotnayls pro fonte infra Abbathiam et pro grangia de Beaurpayre de novo edificanda, de proprio ferro, 3s. 3d. In . . 8 Hurtours pro Carectis . . de proprio ferro faciendis, etc., 10s. 11d.
Soulsilure. To 9 men named various sums, and, Bagmanno capienti in septimana 1d., pro uno anno integro, 4s. 2d. (sic).
Contribuciones. In solucione facta magistro Raymundo Pelegrino Nuncio d'ni pape pro sexto et septimo annis more sue in Anglia, 13s.

Trituracio decimarum. (A new subject). Places named are, North and South Sherburn, Shadforth, Ludworth, Woodham, Chilton, Alverton; In trituracione decimarum de Preston, Rykenhall, et de Acly, nil, quia per servientem de Acley. In una grangea conducta pro bladis decime de Schuruerton metandis, 4s. In uno panno empto pro bladis decimarum ventandis, 18d. In exp. Joh'is del Sayles et Rob'i de Cupon custod. decimas triturandas, 8s.
Summa tritur. dec., 114s.
Summa omn. exp., 927li. 4d. qa.
Excedunt recepta expensas in 548li. 5s. 6d.

DIV2.HEAD: 1349-50. A rough draught, imperfect, but containing some parts not in the last roll.
DIV2.P: Garderoba. In tribus lib. de Gelofre, 23s. 6d. Et in una pixide de Pynyonade empt. apud Novum Castrum, 3s. 6d. In 9 libr. Sucr. de Caffatyn, lib. 2s. 6d., 22s. 6d. In una copula de Pynyonade empt. apud Ebor., 6s. 8d. In una pixide de Gyngebrace empt. apud Ebor. pro Priore, per Ricardum clericum Sacriste, 3s. 6d. In duabus libr. de Resyns sanz Pepyns, 2s. 3d.
Empcio vini. In 16 lag. de vergeous, lag. 10d., 13s. 4d. In novem lag. aceti, lag. 9d., 6s. 9d.

DIV2.HEAD: Per quos Apparently a technical term referring to the contents of the roll. Joh'is de Neuton, S. Mart., 1350-51 (cum dupl.).
DIV2.P: Summa Rec. preter rem. et arr., 1317li. 2s. 10d. cum rem. et arr., 1865li. 8s. 4d.
Garderoba. In uno Rondeleto aceti et uno Rondeleto olei olive emp. pro expens. ejusdem, 10s. In 31 ulnis de Burdalysaundre pro vestimentis inde faciendis, 10s. 9d.

Marescalc. In Tankardis Butelar. d'ni Prioris ligandis et Reynis ferr. pro palefridis ejusdem de proprio ferro faciendis, 14d. In uno Cruper pro longa carecta cum linkis ferr. pro eadem faciendis, 3s. 4d. In factura unius fyle, cum uno Hukschaue pro officio plumbar., cum Wynd∣bandis factis de proprio ferro pro rotis molend. de Wystoue, 13d.
Exp. fr. ver. Cell. D'no Uthredo et socio suo studen∣tibus Oxon., 6li. 6s. 8d.
Elemos. cons. In elemos. dat. per priorem in itinere versus Raby, et, redeundo, servientibus de Fery, 14d.

Dona et exennia Prioris. (Istrionibus ad Natale; ad S. Cuthb. in Sept.; servientibus, et nunciis d'ni Regis; nuncio Ep. Dunelm.) Cuidam garcioni d'ni Rad'i de Neuill deferenti venacionem Priori de presento, 12d. Roberto Stute deferenti ostreas Priori de presento, 12d. (etc.).

Exp. nec. D'no Will'o de Masham, Terrar., pro exp. suis, quia officium suum minus sufficiens, 106s. 8d. Joh'i Plumber pro pipa in aqua de Were de novo facienda, 100s. Eidem pro olla erea de Bracina et alviolis plumbo fururandis et emendandis, 66s. 8d. In frenis empt. pro circulis inde faciendis, 13s. 4d. In calice capelle de Beurep' emendando, 2s. In seris magnarum portarum et hostii Paneterie cum una clave pro portis Carbonum, 12d. In reparacione del Stanbate, cum juncturis factis pro fenestris Camere Armigerorum, 2s. 2d.
Exp. min. Ade Blount pro garniamento Thome fatui, quatuor houces, et quatuor Sarplers consuendis, 22d.
Structura domorum. In mulieribus querentibus et deferentibus Mosse pro stagno molendini Dunolm. stoppando, 2s. 11d.

DIV2.HEAD: Comp. Joh. de Neuton, 1351-2 (cum dupl.), "Per quos," etc.
DIV2.P: Recepta. 10s. 8d. de Wandepenys de Cupon. 13s. 4d. de Averpenys de Cupon. 10s. 9d. de Mesinpenys. 13s. 4d. de Rekepenys parochiarum de Jarowe et Wermouthe. 7li. 3s. 1d. de Wodeladpenys ad festum Nat. beati Joh. Bap.

(Garderoba). In 14 ulnis de Candelwykstret empt. pro Pagiis Prioris et Thoma fatuo, 14s. In lichino emp. pro torgiis, torticiis, et prikettis faciendis, cum factura ejusdem, 6s. 11d. Et in 12 Lampredis empt., 8s. Et in 21 Cutellis empt. pro donis d'ni Prioris, 30s.

(Exp. nec.) Cuidam testi examinato apud Ebor. in causa Prioris, 14d. Et in frenis empt. pro circulis inde faciendis, 19s. Et in clausura facta circa stagnum de Petingdon, 30s. 6d. Et Alano Lang et socio suo operantibus in campo de Houghall pro cursu aque de
Were impediendo, 8s. 8d. Et in via aquatica Minere de Raynton de novo facienda, 39li. 8s. 2d. ob. Ade Blount pro garniamento Thome fatui, 6 par. Caligarum, cum uno frok pro officio Granatoris consuendis, 22d. Et in garnia∣mento T. fatui cum 14 ulnis pro caligis tondendis, 10d. Et in passagio Batelli de Billingham de novo construendo per Alanum de Billingham, 12s. In uno Saylyerde empt. pro molendino de Hesilden, 3s. 8d. Et in Saylclathis empt. pro molend. de Fery, 5s. Et in reparacione molendini de Suthewyk cum Saylclathis empt. pro eodem, 18s.

DIV2.HEAD: 1351, 1352, and 1353. Ten small indented parchment receipts of these dates, or not dated, and a strip of paper with some notes of sums received.
Comp. ejusdem, 1352-3.
DIV2.P: Garderoba. Et in Curtebys empt. pro servientibus d'ni Prioris, 9s. Et in duobus tuellis contin. in longitudine 45 uln. empt. pro camera ejusdem (Prioris), 25s. ob. Et in uno porpays empt. pro expens. d'ni Prioris, 10s. 6d. Et in uno barello de Sturgeon empt. pro expens. d'ni Prioris, 50s.

Empcio vini. Et in quinque doleis vini rubei empt. apud Novum Castrum cum cartagio et expens. cariancium, 40li. 6s. 10d. Et in uno doleo albi vini empt. apud Novum Castrum cum cariagio et exp. cariancium, 7li. 11s. 10d.
Exp. fr. ver. Cell. D'no Uthredo et sociis suis Oxon. studentibus, 4li. 16s.

Dona et Exenn. Prioris. Duobus monachis incipien∣tibus in theologia apud Oxon. ex dono d'ni Prioris, 40s. Merlyne et socio suo nunciis d'ni n'ri Regis ex dono ejusdem (Prioris), 4s. (Other king's messengers).
Exp. nec. In quercubus juvenibus in parco de Beur'p. succedendis, 16s. Et in flore dominico, 3s. 4d. Ep'o Dunelm. pro Ebyare in Were, 8s.
Exp. min. In exp. Capellani et Bursarii venancium apud Muk. per quatuor dies, 16s. ob. Et in uno equo conducto pro barbitonsore diversis vicibus, 20d.

Structura domorum. Et in reparacione unius cotagii in villa de Burdon cum 50 travis straminis empt. pro molendino de Acley et cotag. Hugonis de Rykenall cooperiendis, 9s. 8d. Et in reparacione rotarum molendini de Mukynglyngiswyk, 20s.

DIV2.HEAD: Comp. ejusdem, 1353-4.
DIV2.P: Summa rec. preter arr. et rem., 1495li. 16s. 2d. ob. qa.
cum arr. et rem., 1873li. 14s. 5d. qa.

Garderoba. In tunicis estivalibus empt. pro armigeris d'ni Prioris, 39s. 2d. Et in duabus copulis de Pynyonade et de Gyngebrede, cum duabus libris de anys confyt, 18s. 8d. In di. lib. zinzeb. electi cum di. lib. de Dregy emp. per Joh'm Fossour, 20d. Et in pomis empt. pro expen. domus Prioris, 5s. 9d. In cultellis pro donis Prioris, 30s. 2d.
Marescalcia. Et in uno novo Cruper pro sella del Baghors, 20d. Et in . . Whypcord et rerecordes empt., 5s. 3d.

Exp. nec. D'no Will. de Westle pro exemplificacione del Convenit, "Le Convenit" was an agreement between Bishop Poore and Prior Kerneth, made in 1229, concerning the rights of the Bishop and of the Convent respectively. It is printed in the Feodarium (Surtees Society), pp. 212-17. 20s. Et in 4 sarplers novis pro lanis cariandis, cum filo pro eisdem consuendis et veteribus emendandis, 21s. 5d. Will'o del West pro conductu manerii de Pityngton emendando, 3s. 6d. Et in melis (etc.), cum 1 flake pro cuva bracine, 5s. 5d. Et in 36 flakes factis in parco de Beaurep. et Houghall pro stagno Molendini Dunelm. et Scaltok, 3s. Thome fil. Walteri de Shynclyff pro rotis suis pejoratis in cariacione unius dolii vini Priori, 2s. Et in frenis emp. pro circulis faciendis pro officio bracine, 3s. Et in aqua portanda pro bracina quia pipa fracta, 14d. Et in solucione facta d'no Ep'o pro stagno molend. fullonatici de Akley (tacheando super vastum Ep'i), Secunda manu. 21d.

Exp. min. Will'o de Drayton pro expens. factis in invencione batelli lapidei, 18d. Et in una mappa de Canevace pro camera armigerorum, cum aliis consuendis, 19d. Et in roba consanguinei Ep'i et garniamento Thome fatui, ac caligis ad Natale consuendis, 3s. 6d.

Repar. domor. In . . sarracione 1 Mast apud Jarowe. Will'o Sclatter pro petris batrand. Or bacrand. pro grangia de Beaulu, 8s. 11d. In fenestris vitreis Refectorii emendand., 2s. In fen. vitr. cloace dormitorii emendand., 4s. 4d. In sayleclathes empt. pro molend. de Suthewyk, 10s. In camera armigerorum et le petehous punctand., 5s. 6d. In fenestris vitreis cancelli Infirmarie reparand., 4s.

DIV2.HEAD: 1354 and 1355. Seven indented receipts of these dates and a list of sums due "super Comp. f'ris Joh'is Abel."
Per quos Compot. Joh. de Neuton Mart., 1354, usque Pent., 1355.
DIV2.P: Structura domorum. Thome Sclatter de novo coope∣rienti cameram monachorum, cum capella apud Pitington, 38s. In reparacione del Saylyerdes molendini de Heworth, 21d.

DIV2.HEAD: 1354-5. A headless roll of this date; see below (cum dupl.).
DIV2.P: Garderoba. In 1 lumbare empt. pro d'no Priore, 18d. Et in uno pari calcarium empt. pro d'no Priore, 16d.

Exp. Prioris per maneria. In exp. d'ni Prioris apud Pityngton (etc., 20 Apr. usque 31 Maii de tempore Joh'is de Neuton nuper Burs.), 52s. 7d. qa. Et in expens. ejusdem a festo Sci. Martini in hyeme Anno d'ni Mill'imo cccmoliiijto usque ad idem festum Anno d'ni revoluto . . unde medietas de tempore d'ni Joh'is de Neuton nuper Burs., 21li. 6s. 3d.
