Exp. nec. Will'o de Bruntoftes pro Rauecces et cordulis pro eisdem ab eodem emptis precepto d'ni Prioris, 24s. 6d. Et in uno lapide marmoreo empto pro tumulo d'ni Thome de Stokton, 25s. In una Tyna empt. pro dayaria de Beaurep., 8d. In una sera reparanda pro le Welhousdore, cum 1 clave empt. pro eodem, 4d.
Rep. domor. Rogero de Esshe cooperienti super le Mesondieu, etc.

DIV2.HEAD: Comp. fr. Ade de Derlyngton, Mart., 1355, ad idem fest., 1356 (cum dupl.).
DIV2.P: Garderoba. In 2 flaskes empt. apud Ebor. pro pannis cooperiendis et salvandis in cariacione de Ebor. usque Dunelm., 3s. 6d. Et in una libra de Whibibbes prec. 4s. Et in di. libr. de blaunchepoudre pr. 2s., una lb. de plate, pr. 4s. 2d., una lb. de dragy pr. 6d., empt. et missis apud Beaulu tempore quo Offic. archiep'i Ebor. fuit ibidem cum d'no Priore, 6s. 8d. Et in 30 Skrafisshes empt. pro d'no Priore, 5s. 9d.
Empcio vini. Et in 3 dol. vini emptis apud Hull per d'nm Will'm de la Pole, cum expens. cariancium de Hull usque Dunelm., 17li. 6s. 8d.
Empc. equor. Et in uno equo empto pro d'no Rege, 4li. 5s.
Exp. Pr. per maneria. Et in uno Apro empt. per d'nm Ric'm de Birteley pro hospicio d'ni Prioris, 9s.

Dona et Exennia Prioris. Raine, S.C., 109. Will'o Pyper et aliis istrionibus ad Natale, 6s. Item duobus istrionibus d'ni Ep'i et duobus istrionibus Comitis de Norhamton in festo Sci. Cuthberti in Marcio, 6s. 8d. It. istrionibus d'ni Ep'i ad festum Pasche, 3s. 4d. It. istrionibus in festo Sci. Cuthb. in Sept., 6s. 8d. Et in donis datis d'no Regi et Regine ac eorum ministris, preter unum equum prec. 4li. 5s. ut patet in empcione equorum, 11li. 15s. 3d. Et in 12 Cultellis emptis per Rogerum Couhird pro donis d'ni Prioris apud Muclyngwyk, 12s. 6d. Et in expen. d'ni Will'i de Masham Terrarii versus partes Scocie Edward III having invaded the north of France in November, 1355, soon returned to England on account of troubles in Scotland. The Scots surprised Berwick on November 6th. Balliol, however, renounced his nominal crown on January 20th, about which time Edward invaded and ravaged the south of Scotland, and retook Berwick. cum vexillo Sci. Cuthberti in Comitiva d'ni Regis, cum 1 pipa vini et 1 tentorio empt. pro eodem, 15li. 16s. 8d. Et in 1 sella cariag. cum singulis et canabo emptis pro reparacione alterius veteris tentorii pro itinere ejusdem terrarii, 7s.

Exp. nec. In solucione facta d'no Archiep'o Ebor. et ejus suffraganeo pro dedicacione ecclesie de Aluerton, cum expensis factis die dedicacionis ejusdem ecclesie, 6li. 2s. In 8 sarplers novis pro lanis cariandis, cum filo pro eisdem consuendis, et veteribus emend., 49s. In exp. d'ni Joh'is de Neuton supprioris et d'ni Rogeri de Aluerton trac∣tantium cum consilio d'ni Regis apud Novum Castrum super inhabitacione fratrum apud Aluerton, 10s. Et in solucione facta scaccario d'ni Ep'i pro stagno molend. full. tacheat. super vastum de 4or terminis, 12d. D'no Will'o del Cheker pro exp. suis apud Novum Castrum cum vexillo Sci. Cuthb. d'no Regi deferendo, 2s. Raine, S.C., 109. In exp. Burs. visitantis maneria per Prioratum per diversas vices, terrario existente in Scocia et apud London pro negociis domus, 55s. 10d.

Exp. Min. Will'o Lascels pro exp. suis versus Norham ad premuniend. procur. triturand. decim. ibidem ante adventum d'ni Regis versus Scociam, 2s. Item eidem deferenti literam d'ni Prioris tangentem fratres de monte Carmeli usque Bamburgh ad terrarium, 2s. Waltero Bagmanno pro emundacione gutture sub necessario Infirmarie, 6d. Mulieri gardini Manerii de Petyngton pro factura bras. ex curialitate, precepto d'ni Prioris, 2s. Rauf Hunter querenti unum nigrum summarium d'ni Prioris in Wardall, 3s. Ad. Blount pro garniamento Thome fatui consuendo, et pro filo empto ad idem, 12d.

Repar. domor. In repar. Molendini abbathie, cum colleccione Bruere et Mos pro eodem, 17s. 9d. Et in reparacione de les Saylwandes Molendini de Hesilden, 2s. Joh'i de Bynchestr. pro fenestris vitreis reparandis in cloaca dormitorii et infra dormitorium, 22s. 8d. Et in 1 Lymkilne comburend. apud Pytingdon, 14s. 6d.
Summa omn. Exp., 1236li. 4s. 11d. ob. qa.
Excedunt rec. exp. in 632li. 13s. 3d. qa.

DIV2.HEAD: 1356 and 1357. A bundle of eight indented receipts of these dates or of no date.
1356-7. A headless roll dated 1356 in a modern hand. Date confirmed by entries corresponding with Prior's Roll of 1356-7.
DIV2.P: Garderoba. In una libra rubee cere empt. pro sigill. d'ni Prioris, 2s. This entry occurs frequently.
Marescalcia. In uno malleo ferr. et 1 poleax, 3 Wharelwegges faciendis de proprio ferro, cum 2 petris de ferro fabri empt. ad perfeccionem eorundem, et calibe empt. pro eisdem, 2s. 10d.
Elem. consueta. In distribucione facta pro animabus d'ni Rob. de Thorpp et d'ni Will'i de Masham, 20s.
Dona et exennia d'ni Prioris. Cuidam heraldo armorum die Sci. Cuthberti in Marcio, precepto d'ni Prioris, 6s. 8d. Cuidam garcioni de Staunford nuncianti mortem d'ni Will'i de Masham, 12d.

Exp. nec. In exp. d'ni Will'i de Masham versus Lond. ad parliamentum pro negociis domus, 20s. Et in factura unius Wodeax pro Camera d'ni Prioris, 12d. Et in
300 girthes querculinis empt. pro cuvis et doleis in officio bracine, 16s. Et in expens. ejusd. (Bursarii) visitantis maneria per prioratum terrario existente ad parliamentum et eciam post mortem ejusdem, 17s. Et in 2 fadom de louerstringes empt. pro novo Solario, cum 3 cordulis pro les Masshefattes, 9d.

Exp. min. Cuidam capienti ratones infra Abbathiam, pro labore suo, 9d. In uno pari de Panyars cooperiend. pro coquina d'ni Prioris, 2s. 8d. Joh'i Seger pro nattes faciend. pro Camera d'ni Prioris, 11d. Item pro catenis, chapes, et leshes, et uno Cornu pro venatore d'ni Prioris, per manus ejusdem, 7s. 11d. In mundacione del Swyn∣hirst in parco de Beaurep. per man. ejusd., 10s. 7d. Et in sepultura Thome fatui et necessariis expensis circa corpus ejusdem, per manus d'ni Prioris, 2s. 7d. Et in Cepis et unyonnsede et alio semine in orto suo seminando p. m. ejusdem, 20d. Et in computariis emptis p. m. ejusdem, 13d.

Repar. domor. Thome Bugy querenti petras in qwerrera pro parietibus circa herbarium d'ni Prioris reparandis, 3s. In reparacione (etc.) cum duobus clavibus empt. pro le Petehousdore et porta del Wodegarth, 9d. Et in coopertura Cancelli ecclesie de Akley cum spone per diversa loca, 4s.

DIV2.HEAD: c. 1357? A headless roll.
DIV2.P: Under Recepta have lately appeared two new heads, viz.:—

Bondag. ad firmam dimiss. Et de 6li. 18s. rec. de 7 bondag. ad firmam dimissis in villa de Munketon. Et de 26s. 8d. rec. de Hugone filio Ric'i pro 2 ploughswaynlandes in Fulwell. Et de 20s. rec. de Ric'o fil. Laur. et Agn. Crampe pro 2 Grislandes in eadem villa. (Etc.; 23 entries in all. Sum total, 26li. 13s. 8d.).

Opera. Et de 15s. rec. de Elia Brownyng pro operibus suis annualibus debitis Manerio de Fulwell. Et de 6s. 9d. rec. de eodem pro operibus suis Autumpnal. eidem manerio debitis. (Etc.; 15 entries. Total, 6li. 2s. 5d. Manors named are Fulwell, Wardley, and Merrington).
Et de 31s. rec. de tenentibus et socmannis de Nether∣heworth [et Overheworth erased] pro operibus suis autumpnalibus debitis Manerio de Wardley.
Garderoba. In una libra et di. de Sandres cum aliis coloribus, prec. 7s. di. lb. de Alkenet, prec. 12d.
Empc. porcor. Et in uno apro empt. pro d'no Priori per Capellanum d'ni Prioris, 14s.
Exp. fr. ver. Cellas. D'no Uthredo et sociis suis Oxon. student., 10li. Et eidem d'no Uthredo incipienti in Theologia apud Oxon., 13li. 6s. 8d.

Dona et Exenn. Pr. Et Will'o Blyndharpour ad Natale, 2s. Et cuidam Haraldo Armorum vocato Volaunt, 6s. 8d. Et cuidam Collectori viridis cere d'ni Regis de Comitatu Northumbr., 2s. Et cuidam Haraldo Armor. ducis Lancastr., 6s. 8d. Et Joh'i Harpour d'ni Joh'is de Streuelyn et Will'o Blyndharpour de Novo Castro, 3s. 4d. Et duobus Trompours Comitis de Norhampton apud Wyuestow, 4s. Et cuidam Harpour vocato Rygeway, 3s. 4d.

Exp. nec. Et in soluc. facta Joh'i fil. Petri de Fery pro carbonibus subterraneis in terra sua, et pro communa sua pasture in separali pastura d'ni Prioris ab eo empt. in villa de Fery, 6li. Et in exp. cujusdam hominis Archi∣diaconi euntis ad Curiam Romanam in negociis domus tangentibus Ep'm, 7li. 6s. 6d. Et in 1 longa corda empta pro le Stanbate, longitudinis 35 fadom, 3s. 9d. Et in 2 peciis argenteis cum 2 cohopertoriis ponder. 53s. empt. pro d'no Priore, 64s. Et in 4 bus. et di. pis. virid. empt. ad seminandum in campo de Pityngton, 3s. 9d. Et in aqua carianda usque Abbathiam quia pipa fracta, 4d. Et cuidam Ratonario capienti Ratones infra abbathiam per diversa loca, 15d. Et Roberto de Rowclyff de Ebor. pro expensis factis in exequiis d'ni Joh'is de Rowclyf quondam monachi Dunolm., qui obiit apud Ebor., 19s. 6d. Et in expens. carectar. de Houghall et Pityngton versus Ebor. cum Regina Scocie, 3s. 4d. Et in reparacione stagni molend. Abbathie cum Mos et Lyng lucratis pro eadem, 4s. 8d. ob. Et in 2 bus. de grotes et 2 bus. alb. pis. empt. pro coquina, 3s. 11d.

Exp. min. Et in exp. unius garcionis Burs. cum uno equo versus Oxon. pro monachis reducendis, 3s. 4d. Et Joh'i Tonis (?) et Will'o Lascels deferentibus literas Abbatibus de Ebor. Selby, et Whytby, pro negociis tangentibus incepcionem d'ni Uthredi in Theologia, pro expens. suis diversis vicibus, 6s. 4d. Et in flekes empt. pro le Stankart pro calce et sabulo cariand., 2s. Et Simoni Downs colpanti focale pro camera d'ni Prioris, 14d.; 1 louerstryng empt. pro bracina; Et in 4 cheris Or "theris." empt. pro
Jumentis del Stankart, 12d. Et Dauid fabro pro quodam clave facto pro hostio ad capud conductus in bosco de Eluet, et pro aliis minutis faciendis, 8d. Et in 3 petr. et di. feodi Coquine et sepi empt. pro carectis et ferr. molend. ungend., 3s. 6d. Et in diversis flekes empt. pro Skaffaldyng et pro le Stanbate, 3s. 5d. Et cuidam clerico registranti dimissiones terrarum per prioratum a tempore mortalitatis, 5s. Et in 2 seruris empt. pro le Stanbate et pro porta del Wodeyard, 4d. Et Will'o de Stottesyete pro puleyns et aliis necessariis faciendis, precepto d'ni Prioris, 14d.

Reparac. domor. Et Joh'i Prentys pro Stanaxes, Hakkes, pikkes, chesels, et pinceouns ponenend. (sic) et acuand. per vices, 6s. 5d. pro petris lucrand. et batrand. in parco de Beaurep. (Limekilns at Pittington and Westoe). Et in 4m stanlattes faciend. in parco de Muclyngwyk, 18s. Et in 2 mill. Spons faciend. ibidem, 16s. Et Donaldo Theker pro diversis domibus in ballio australi et bothis super pontem cohoperiendis ad tascam, 13s. 5d. Et in bruera lucrata pro dictis domibus cooperiendis, et pro muris del Malthous, 2s. 3d. Et in cc bord. de Waynscot et c Reggalt' empt. apud Novum Castrum cum expens. cariancium, 68s. 8d. Et in Wyndbandes, 6 Milnpikkes et cc Spykyng' de proprio ferro factis pro molend. Abbathie, 2s. 10d. Et Ric'o Mason in partem solucionis duarum marcarum pro 3 par. Molarum lucrand. juxta Muclyngwyk, preter Landleve et eorundem, 13s. 4d.
Contribuciones. Et in solucione facta Ep'o de Armaugh in subsidium defens. cause sue contra fratres in Curia Romana, 40s.

DIV2.HEAD: c. 1357. A headless roll different from the last. Rough draught.
DIV2.P: Exp. nec. In solucione facta Archid'o del Estryddyng in suplementum Pens. sue de Anno lvjto, 13s. 4d.
Garderoba. In diversis speciebus empt. per Capel∣lanum d'ni Prioris videlicet Gobet Reall, anys Comfett, et Madryam, 7s. 4d.
Dona et exenn. Pr. Istrionibus d'ni Ep'i (Harpers, Heralds, etc., as before).
Exp. nec. Et in 76 petr. plumbi quesitis de cineribus plumbi, cum 4 lades de Charkol et pet. empt., 13s. 2d.

DIV2.HEAD: c. 1358. A headless roll with a duplicate. Year '57 mentioned.
DIV2.P: Garderoba. In 12 uln. de Chekery empt. pro diversis pagiis, prec. uln. 7d., 7s. Et 2 viduis Sce. Marie pro canabo suo, 4s. Et Ade Blount pro factura 2 tunicarum, unius corset, 2 cucullarum, unius mantelli, 3 par. caligarum, et aliorum garniamentorum d'ni Prioris, 6s. (In Spalder∣lyngges, skrafisshes, dates, Walnotes, pomis, 2 cranes et al. volatil.). Et in 5 quaternis de papyr empt., 2s. 5d. Et in 4 cultell., 13 par. cerotecar., Mostly for presents, no doubt. 2 lumbar., et 2 hoyrs empt. de Ad. Cuteler per priorem, 18s. 6d. (2 doz. pr. gloves), Mostly for presents, no doubt. et j par. cerotecar. fururat. pro d'no Priore.

Exp. fr. ver. Cell. D'no Uthredo et sociis suis Oxon. studentibus, 13li. 6s. 8d. Et eisdem pro expens. suis a retro existentibus de anno elapso, 66s. 8d. Item eidem d'no Uthredo pro exp. factis ad incepcionem suam in Theologia ultra summam sibi solutam in anno precedenti, 14li. Et in exp. 2 garcionum cum 2 equis versus Oxon. pro d'no Uthredo et sociis suis reducendis, 7s. 4d.

Dona et exennia Prioris. Cementariis facientibus novum dormitorium apud Fynchalgh, 12d. Item Palfray∣pageo et Usherpageo ad tunicas suas, 4s. Joh'i Cole Usherpage, Joh'i Cokepage, et Joh'i Palfraypage, 5s. Ancille manerii de Pityngton pro brasio faciendo, 2s. 2d. In uno Chariot empt. et dat. d'no Regi, cum 6 equis et toto apparatu pro eisdem, cum expens. Joh'is de Bamburgh et aliorum secum existencium versus Lond. pro predicto Chariot d'no Regi offerend. ut patet per parcellas, 32li. 11s. 10d.

Exp. nec. Will'o Randman pro pylyng et sortyng lane, pro labore suo, 10s. Joh'i Goldsmyth pro factura unius par. de Crowettes pro capella d'ni Prioris, cum argento ad suplementum eorundem et auro pro deauracione eorundem, 17s. 8d. In solucione facta Emme que fuit uxor Nich. de Heburne pro dote sua de terris ad ten. Will'i fil. Will'i fil. Joh'is existentis in warda Prioris de 2 annis prox. elapsis, 20d. In uno puteo Probably a coal-pit shaft. de novo sinkando in campo de Fery, 13s. 9d. Sawnapes pro magna mensa in refectorio. In factura et mundacione stagni molendini de Pityngton, 36s. 5d. In diversis foveis et gutturis factis in le Staunkmedowe de Pityngton, 12s. 1d.

Exp. Min. In mundacione del Wolhouse sub camera Prioris, 6d. In 2 flekes de novo empt. pro magnis cuvis in le Gilehous cooperiend. cum aliis flekes veteribus et hirdeles emendandis, 3s. 1d. Et in Countours empt. apud London. pro d'no Priore, 2s. In 1 par. de Panyars empt. apud London. pro diversis rebus trussandis, 6d. In 3 louerstryngges empt. pro bracina, 3d. In 4 bus. de Grotes emp. pro coquina, 3s. 6d.
Struct. domor. In repar. molend. de Acley, cum 5s. liberatis Thome Wright pro le dam sustinend., 7s. 4d.

DIV2.HEAD: 1359? A portion of a roll containing part of the receipts, and, on the back, the concluding portion of the expenses.
1360-61. A headless roll mentioning 1359 and '60 as being in the preceding account (cum dupl.).
DIV2.P: Summa rec. cum arr. et rem., 1513li. 9s. 4d.

Garderoba. In una furura nigra de tibiis empt. pro mantell. d'ni Prioris, 11s. In 5 quaternis de Paypr empt. de Joh'e Spycer de Novo Castro pro diversis expensis, 2s. 1d. (6 furur. pro servientibus camere Prioris, 8s.; russet., blanket., canab., pro Bedemannis et Werkmannis, et pro houces, et 4 viduis Sce. Marie; 1 duod. cerotec. pro d'no Priore, 2s. 6d.; et in uno pare cerot. furrat. empt. pro d'no Priore, 18d.).

Marescalcia. In 4 lades ferri de Werdall, 51s. In 21 petr. ferri de Spayne, petr. 9d. ob., 16s. 7d. ob. In 2 cartbodyes empt. cum exacione et emendacione de les Wodcartes per vices, et felyes inponend. in rotis de les Wodcartes, 8s. 9d. In factura unius Bill pro les fagoters et uno pulypyk empt. pro minera de Heworth, 16d.

Dona et exhenn. Prioris. Cuidam Nuncio d'ni Regis per Will'm Porter, 2s. Perot, palfraypage Prioris, 2s. Will'o Pyper et aliis istrionibus ad Natale per manus Joh'is del Sayles, 8s. 4d. Cuidam nuncio d'ni Regis vocato Bulfote per manus Capellani, 3s. 4d. Cuidam Welsharpour d'ni Will'i de Dalton, 3s. 4d. Cuidam monacho de Abyngton incipienti in Theologia apud Oxon., 40s. Et vicario Bursarii in ecclesia pro di. anno, 3s. 4d.

Exp. nec. et min. In una simia empt. apud Ebor. pro d'no Priore, 31s. Cuidam lotrici pro locione pannor.
lineor. et mappar. Burs. per 2 annos, 2s. David fabro pro factura unius securis pro lattes faciend., 4d. In exp. pro diversis arrer. levandis in Werehalfshire, 12d. Joh'i lepe∣maker pro 4 sportis pro bracina et 4 sportis pro le Malthous, 2 scuteles, 2 flekes pro Cuvis in bracina, et 4 flekes pro les Wodcartes et aliis vasis, 8s. 4d. In solucione facta Ricardo Hopper pro dampnis factis in le Morehousfeld per supervenientes ad mineram de Raynton, 2s. Cuidam mulieri pro ventilacione 32 qar bras., et pro saccis consuendis, 7d. In 7 duoden. pell. cuniculorum empt. pro d'no Priore, 7s. In 2 duoden. cerotecar., 5s.; In 2 duod. cerotec., cum cultellis et hoyrs empt. de Adam Coteler, 33s. In 1 hayr empt. pro Thorali, 40s.
Summa omn. exp., 758li. 7s. 7d.

DIV2.HEAD: c. 1360. A headless roll.
DIV2.P: Summa recepti, 1690li. 16s. 10d. ob. qa.
Cum rem. et arr., 2038li. 17s. 8d. ob.
Garderoba. In 1 pane de zukre caffatyne empt., 9s. 6d. In j barell zukre de Cypre empt. continent. 73 lb., 47s. In 4 huyrs, 3 cultellis empt. de Ad. Cuteler per Priorem, 6s. 6d.
Empcio vini. In vino empt. de eodem Joh'e (de Stanhopp) per Willemum de Esyngton cariageman Prioris, 13s. 5d. In 1 lag. et 1 pynte de Crete empt. in villa per Capellanum, 4s. 6d.

Exp. fr. ver. Cell. D'no Uthredo et sociis suis Oxon. studentibus, 13li. 6s. 8d. Item eidem d'no Uthredo per manus Henr. de Weland, Rob'ti de Walworth, terrarii, et Joh'is de Tikhill, 15li. 13s. 4d. Item eidem d'no Uthredo per manus d'ni Rob'i de Rokes socii Aule de Marton, 6li. 16s. 8d. Item d'no Uthredo versus Capitulum generale pro expens. suis, 6s. 8d.

Dona et exenn. d'ni Prioris. Petro Crouder apud Pityngton, per Capellanum, 3s. 4d. Item eidem Petro pro uno quarterio ordii sibi dato per Priorem, 4s. 6d. Duobus Istrionibus Episcopi in festo Assens. D'ni, 4s. In una summa alb. pisc. empt. per Joh'm del Sayles et missa cantoribus ludentibus apud Beaurep., 3s. 6d. Et cuidam Istrioni Maioris ville Novi Castri per Capellanum, 2s. Suffraganeo d'ni Ep'i de dono d'ni Prioris, 20s. Et quibusdam ministris d'ni Regis fugantibus boves versus partes australes, de dono Prioris, 3s. 4d.

Exp. nec. In soluc. facta Petro Broun de Fery pro carbonibus subterraneis ab eo emptis in campo de Fery, 46s. 8d. In una batella empt. per Petrum Leget pro vivario de Pityngton, 13s. 4d. In 2 pec. de bulteclathes de Reyns empt. apud London, 11s. 4d. In exp. factis super unum puteum et di. carbonum in campo de Fery sinkandum cum flekes pro eisdem, 23s. 3d. In 1 corda continente 41 fadom empt. ad extendend. ultra aquam pro focal. cariand. per le Stanbate, 5s. 7d.

Exp. min. Cuidam Ratonario capienti Ratones in diversis locis infra abbathiam, 18d. Cuidam Carpentario operanti super facturam unius putei apud Fery per 12 dies duabus vicibus, 3s. Item cuidam homini operanti super mundacionem stagni infra Curiam Abbathie, 5d. Item cuidam homini certificanti campos decimales in villa de Southshirburna inter Priorem et Magistrum de Kipyer, 15d. In uno cultello et 2 shavyngirnes empt. pro officio plumbarii, 9d.
Repar. domor. In reparacione columbarii et unius pontis apud Pityngton, 6s. In 24 flekes pro le Malthous et 1 fleke pro le Stanbate faciend., 2s. 9d.

Contribuciones. In contrib. facta Ep'o de Armaugh in subsidium defensionis sue contra fratres in Curia Romana, videlicet de Marca 1d., 34s. 4d. ob. Collectori decime annalis d'no Regi Anglie a clero concesse pro eccl. et pens. infra Com. Ebor. de Imo termino, 100s. do. infra aquas, 13li. 6s. 9d. qa. Abbati de Cluny pro pace reformanda pro eccles. et pens. in com. Ebor., 21s. 1d. ob. qa. Eidem, etc., infra aquas et in Northumbria, 7li. 19s. ob. qa.

DIV2.HEAD: Expens. hospicii D'ni Prioris a festo Sci. Martini anno D'ni, etc., lxmo usque festum Pent. ao lxjmo.
DIV2.P: Apud Wyuestoue, Pyttyngdon, Beaurepair.
Item histrionibus, nunciis, et famulis aliorum domi∣norum, 13s. 4d. Ep'o Elemos., 3s. 4d. Sella cum freno, 5s. 4d. Minut. Exp., 21s. 4d.
Summa totalis, 8li. 4d. ob.
(On a small slip only 10 in. by 5 in.).

DIV2.HEAD: 1361? A much decayed fragment assigned to that year.
Comp. fr'is Joh. Abell, SS. Perp. et Felic. (Mar. 7), 1362, ad Pent. (May 21), 1363 (cum dupl. in parte). It is not evident why this roll gives such a short account.
DIV2.P: Varia Recepta. Item r. de 52li. rec. de d'no Ric'o de Byrtley nuper Bursario tempore adventus sui, ut patet per indenturam. (This is the only head of receipts in this roll).
Summa Var. Rec., 177li. 15s. 3d.
Rec. cum Arr., 1077li. 4s. 10d.
Garderoba. In 30 uln. de fustyan empt. pro vesti∣mentis factis ad usum ecclesiarum paroch., 13s. 4d.
Marescalc. In reparac. 3 Colers pro carect. Prior., 9d. In 12 peciis de Qwypcord empt. pro carectar., 4d.
Dona et ex. Pr. In uno equo empt. pro rectore ecclesie de Croft ex dono Prioris, 34s.

Exp. min. In 1 Tunnyngmell et 2 duzayns de ciphis ligneis empt., 2d. ob. Item in reparacione unius Cloge pro Cymba cum ferro, et 1 Gowfleg' Goufleg in duplicate. empt., 10d. ob. Item in 1 cofyn empt. apud Ebor. pro literis Prioris imponend. et car., 1d. ob. Item in reparacione 1 ciphi ad deserviend. Burs. pro supervenientibus, 30s. 9d.
Summa Exp., 278li. 12d.
Exc. Rec. in 799li. 3s. 10d.

DIV2.HEAD: 1362? A headless roll so dated on wrapper.
DIV2.P: Summa rec., 1579li. 6s. 5d. ob.
cum Arr., 2262li. 2s. 5d. ob.
Marescalcia. In uno pari forcipis magni pro forgia, 6d.

Dona et ex. Pr. Item cuidam histrioni harper ep'i Norwychie in festo Transl. Sci. Cuthb., 5s. Will'o Couper ad reparacionem duorum Wymbles, quia fracta in opere Prioris, 12d. Roberto Carter ad sanacionem tibie sue fracte, precepto Prioris, 6s. 8d. Cuidam Istrioni Jestour Jawdewyne in festo Natalis D'ni, 3s. 4d. Will'o (harpour erased) ye kakeharpour ad idem festum, 2s. Et Barry similem (sic) sibi ad id. fest., 2s. Et cuidam ystrioni ceco franco cum uno puero fratre suo, 2s. Barry harper ex precepto Prioris in una tunica emp., 3s. 4d.

Exp. nec. et min. In uno libro vocato Donato emp. precepto Prioris pro Carda Will'i Mayore, 18d. Ric'o
Chalowner pro factura tapetorum et Bankquers pro capella Prioris, preter lanam pro eis emp., 32s. 5d. In exp. factis per Terrarium in visitasione Archidiachonatus pro ecclesiis Prioris in episcopatu Dunelm., 23d. ob. In dimidia marca de Countours emp. ibidem (Lond.) pro Scaccario, 2s. 8d. In una Paxbrede emp. ibidem pro capella Prioris, 4d.; pro uno reynge emp. pro pistrina, 18d.; pro duabus temys emp. pro pistrina, 2s. In soluc. facta per Terrarium duobus garcionibus Prioris ducentibus duos equos d'no principi de Priore, 18s. 4d. In duabus frenis emp. per Terr. pro eisdem equis, et pro supercingulis, 7s. 6d. Thome Swan pro uno bag faciendo de coreo in bracinio pro braseo, 12d. In exp. D'ni Uthredi et socii sui versus Alnewyk ad sepulturam d'ne de Percy, 7s. 3d. ob. In emendacione unius scope pro aqua evacuanda in quarera, 2d. In 12 peciis de Whepecorde pro carectariis, 4d.
Repar. domor. In repar. unius tenem. in Pypewelgate in tenura cujusdam fabri, 2s.

DIV2.HEAD: Comp. fr. Joh. Abell, Pent., 1363-4.
DIV2.P: Rec., 1276li. 18s. 6d. ob. qa.
Cum Arr. et Mut., 2109li. 2s. 4d. ob. qa.

Garderoba. (Sundry garments post liberac'). It. in uno panno et quart. pann. empt. pro somersercortes pro armigeris Prioris, cum tonsura ejusdem, 66s. 8d. 6 lb. de Sugreroset, lb. ad 7d. It. 14 lb. cere empt. de domo de Jarowe, pr. lb. 8d. It. in 2 cofynys de confeccionibus, 3s. 4d. It. in 9 lb. Sucr. de Sipr. empt. in uno laf apud Ebor. pro priore, 19s. 6d. It. in 4 lb. et di. de Gynger confet et 4 lb. et di. de Anys confet empt. ibi pro eodem, 24s. Item 6 Coffyns de diversis confeccionibus emptis de Joh'e Spicer de Novo Castro ad diversa precia, 10s. 6d. It. in uno pixide de pynioniade empt. apud London pro priore per Will'm Lassels, 7s. In tribus paribus botarum empt. in coilla, 1 pari de Cordewayn, et 2 par. de correo bono, cum 1 pari de Galag' pro priore, 12s. 8d. In j par. de galog' cum una quarta olei, 16d. In uno par. de Coffres empt. apud London. pro capella Prioris, 20s. In 9 qart. 5 bus. salis de pattow empt. cum exp. circa cariac. eorundem, 62s.

Mareschalcia. In 2 cellis scottorum emptis pro d'no Rege per terrarium, 6li. 6s. 8d. It. in uno barehyde empt. pro longa carecta Prioris, 28s. 7d. It. in uno deudeno de Wypcord emp. pro carectariis, 5d.
Exp. fr. ver. Cellas. D'no Utredo pro exp. suis versus capitulum generale, 73s. 4d. Sociis scolaribus Oxon. studentibus, 13li. 6s. 8d.
Elem. cons. Pro animabus 3 fratrum nostrorum defunctorum, pro quolibet 10s., 30s.

Dona et exenn. Prioris. Cuidam portanti capellam Prioris de London, 12d. It. cantoribus in Adventu D'ni cum histrionibus ibidem ex dono Prioris, 13s. 4d. It. cuidam histrioni die Dominica Quasimodo geniti, 2s.

Exp. nec. et min. In 2 arcubus empt. apud Novum Castrum pro d'no Rege, 13s. 4d. It. in vino pro communione paroch. de Merington ad Pasch., 14d. In uno Rete pro canapis factis circa corpus D'ni pro ecclesiis paroch., 2s. 2d. In uno caton' cum 1 pare tabellarum emp. pro Joh'e de Hethelworth Ward. Prior., 10d. It. in dimidio uncio veridis cerici pro lac(iniis?) fac' pro confirmacione cart' regis Scocie, 10d. It. in exp. circa literam regis Scocie, 6s. 8d. (Will'o Lassels) deferenti literas Regis Scocie apud Edynburgh, 6s. 8d.
Struct. domor. Will'o Lymbrennere pro combustione unius thorall' calcis, cum costag. fracture petr., 7s. 11d.
Summa omn. exp., 1441li. 5d. ob. qa.

DIV2.HEAD: 1364-5. Raine (S.C., 109) gives the following extracts under this date, but I have not been able to verify them, or indeed to find a roll so dated.—ED.
DIV2.P: "The expences of a Chaplain for two days at Ketton about the fishing against the feast of St. Cuthbert in March, 4s. 3d. To a boy of the Lord Percy bringing a present to the Prior on the vigil of St. Cuthbert, 2s. To two players of the Lord Duke at the said feast, 6s. 8d."

DIV2.HEAD: c. 1364-5. A headless roll in which '64 is mentioned.
DIV2.P:
Garderoba. In 3 pannis sericis et cum auro stragulatis, cum 24 uln. de Bleukard, cum toto apparatu empt. apud London. pro uno vestimento integro faciendo, cum 2 capis, pro eccl'ia de Aluerton, 8li. In 1 uncia et di. serici et viridi filo, 2 uln. Canab. empt. pro eisdem vesti∣mentis, 3s. 10d. In factura ejusdem, 9s. In tuels empt. pro magno altari ibidem, 7s. 2d. In panno lineo empto
pro 1 corpras pro ecclesia de Merington, 10d. In 3 paribus botarum, 1 pari de Galoches empt. pro d'no Priore, 10s. 8d.
Maresc. In Gummis, unguento, et aliis attramentis empt. pro equis infirmis, 2s. 6d. In Kypstringes pro carectis, et Whipcorde et aliis cordis empt., 15d.

Dona, etc., Prioris. In 2 peciis arg. cum coopertor. empt. pro d'no Priore de Will'o de Ouyngham, 4li. 12s. 7d. Ep'o Elemosinar. per manus d'ni Petri de Dunelm., 3s. 4d. (Eidem ep'o per burs., 20d. erased). Duobus clericis pauperibus ven. de Curia Romana per manus Capellani, 12d. Cuidam homini Prioris de Tynmouth differenti Graspais Priori, 3s. 4d. Item uni differenti exennium de d'no de Neuyll per manus ejusdem (Petr. de Dunelm.), 3s. 4d. Ad reparacionem campanilis Sci. Oswaldi per eandem Indenturam (Prioris), 40s. Cuidam aucipi ven∣denti aves, 2s. 2d.

Exp. nec. Duobus ratonariis capientibus Ratones, 18d. In emendacione calicis capelle Sce. Katerine de Beaure∣paire in parte soluc. 12s., 5s. 4d. In batello emp. de Petro Legat pro vivario de Pytyngton, 13s. 4d. In 1 rethe magno et novo, 26s. 8d. Cuidam medico sananti tibiam Thome Harpour, There was a carpenter of this name in the service of the Abbey at the time. 10s. In exp. d'ni Uthredi et Burs. apud Aluerton ad loquend. cum d'no ep'o, 5s. 10d. Carigiamanno pro expen. suis versus Ripley, 12d.

DIV2.HEAD: c. 1365-6. A headless roll mentioning payment of money borrowed in 1364.
DIV2.P: Marescalcia. In una lada ferri mollis, 13s. 10d. In solucione facta Hugoni Palfreyman pro curacione et marescalcia grisei Palfredi Prioris apud Novum Castrum, 8s. 8d. Pro 2 paribus de Trays et 2 cartrapes; in trays, cartrapes, capistris, et reynes, 18s.
Exp. fr. ver. cellas. D'no Uthredo et sociis suis Oxon. studentibus, 13li. 6s. 8d.

Dona et exhenn. Prioris. Quibusdam monachis de Ermonia per dominum Priorem, 6s. 8d. Cuidam homini differenti ferinam d'no Priori de d'no de Neuyll, 3s. 4d. do. de d'no de Percy, 3s. 4d. do. de d'no de Neuyll in vig. Natal. D'ni, 3s. 4d. do. de Tindale d'no Priori, 12d. (Barry Harpour, ystrionibus, nunciis, as usual). Uni ceco et aliis pauperibus, 4s. 2d.
Exp. nec. In exp. factis apud Merington pro Abbate Sci. Albani per unam noctem, vidz. in vino et speciebus, 3s. 8d., in feno 18d., in prebenda equor., 8s. 6d.
Exp. min. In chapes empt. pro Coleriis pro canibus Prioris, per d'nm Joh'em de Beryngton, 20d.

DIV2.HEAD: c. 1366-8. A long but headless roll mentioning a building account of '66-8 and a Norham account of '67.
DIV2.P: Garderoba. In panno empto pro uno Goune et uno collobio (etc.). A very long account of the usual articles.
Empc. equor. In uno equo Bay, do. griseo, do. nigro.

Marescalcia. In uno freno aquatico emp. pro palefr. Prioris, 18d. Joh'i Stapawai pro acuacione et posicione quatuor securium pro grosso meremio colpando, 20d. In duobus furgons emp. pro camera d'ni Prioris, 12d. In una corda continente 12 fadomes pro luminari nove coquine, 8d.
Exp. fr. v. cell. D'no Uthredo (ut supra), 13li. 6s. 8d.; eidem pro exp. de Oxon. usque Dunelm., 50s.
Dona et exhen. Ministrallis, Istrionibus, portantibus ferinam, capones, oystres d'no Priori, etc.).

Exp. nec. Magistro de Farne de quodam annuo redditu exeunte de manerio de Raby, monachis ibidem concessa per d'nm Rob'tum de Neuill, 20s. In pane emp. pro equis del Wodecartes cariant. ordeum de Thorp usque Dunelm., 4d. ob.
Exp. min. in tribulis emp. pro Abbathia et quarera, 2s.

Reparacio domorum. In expen. factis circa facturam nove coquine a festo Sci. Martini Anno, etc., lxvj usque finem hujus compoti, per unum annum et di., tam de operar. et quarrur. quam de Cementar. et aliis minutis expen. pro eisdem, ut patet per Rotulum continentem dietas, 180li. 18s. 7d. (Same amount exactly in 1367-9; see p. 573).

DIV2.HEAD: Comp. Joh'is de Beryngdon de denariis per ipsum receptis et expensis circa structuram nove coquine a festo Sci. Martini Anno D'ni Millesimo ccc lxviijo, usque (blank). This Roll includes the expenses mentioned at the head of Reparaciones domorum, in the Bursar's Roll of 1368-9. It is referred to in Scriptores tres, 132, note, where it is spoken of as if it were the only one. There were, however, similar accounts for 1366-8 and 1370-71, as appears in the Bursar's Rolls of those years. No rolls of 1369-70 have been preserved. The work appears to have been going on at least from 1366 to 1371. Date re-written; read lxvijo; see p. 572.
DIV2.P: Idem respondet de 4li. receptis de collectoribus nove collecte, ut patet per indenturam inter ipsos factam.
Et de 76s. 8d. receptis de iisdem collectoribus per eandem indenturam.
Et de 6li. 14s. 4d. receptis de eisdem per aliam indenturam de Ao D'ni, etc., lxx (?) inter ipsos factam.
Et de 40s. receptis de eisdem per manus Joh'is de Billesfeld sine indentura.

[The names and numbers of the workmen are stated each week, with their wages, but as the upper part of the Roll is partly illegible, only the main facts are here given therefrom, certain weeks' accounts being given below, by way of specimens, with other matters of interest].

Week 1, Summa septimane, 21s. 1d. Week 2, 24s. 8d. Week 3, 20s. 1d. Week 4, 22s. 11d. Week 5, 22s. 11d. Week 6, 24s. 8d. Week 7, 17s. 11d. Week 8, 15s. 2d. Week 9, 33s. 7d. Week 10, 48s. 2d. Weeks 11, 12, the accounts run as follows:—
(Week 11).

Cementar. xv. D'nica proxima ante festum Sci. Pauli, Joh'i de Rippon, 2s. 6d. Joh'i de Redworth, 2s. 2d. Joh'i de Stanlawe, 2s. 4d. Ric'o de Ingowe, 2s. 4d. Ric'o Clerkson, 2s. 6d. Laur. de Essh, 2s. 4d. Ade de Chestir, 2s. 6d. Joh'i de Neddirton, 2s. Ric'o de Meryngton, 2s. Ric'o de Goldisburgh, 22d. Henr. de Shirburne, 22d. Joh'i Kay, 2s. 2d. Ade Mason, 2s. 1d. Will'o Kay, 2s., et Joh'i Kay, juniori, 2s. operantibus ut supra, This refers either to the heading of the roll, or to something not now legible. cuilibet corum ut patet per capita.—32s. 7d. pro septimana.

Quarer. et operar. x. Item eodem die Will'o de Andirstowe, Joh'i de Lyndesay, Joh'i de Esyngton, Joh'i de Duresme, Waltero Bagman, Ric'o Potter, Will'o Coke, Rob'to Ewere, Joh'i de Lincolna, Will'o Morthyng, operantibus ut supra, cuilibet capienti ut supra, in persolucionem pro 5 diebus et di., 17d. Et Joh'i Palfray∣man ibidem per duos dies et di., 8d., 13s. 10d., pro 5 diebus et di.
Summa septimane, 47s. 5d.
(Week 12).
Cementar. xv. D'nica prox. ante festum Sce. Brigide Virginis [as above].

Quarer. et operar. xiiij. Item eodem die [as above, with] Thome Buggy, Joh'i Palfray, Joh'i de Benyngburgh,
et Joh'i de Stokyslay [as above] pro 4 diebus et di., 14d., et eisdem operantibus ad potum 4d., et duobus quarer. pro rewardo pro 4 septim. 12d., 17s. 8d. pro quatuor diebus et di.
Joh'es Lewyne. Item Joh'i Lewyne magistro cementar. pro primo quarterio anni, 66s. 8d.
Summa septimane, 116s. 11d.
Summa quarterii primi, 20li. 15s. 6d.

Expense minute pro Cementar. et quarer. In ope∣racione 30 petr. ferri in 23 secur. Cementar., 25 ponsones, cum chissils, 4 hakkis, 2 pikkis, et 19 weggis, petra ad 4d., 10s. Et in operacione 4 petr. et di. in calibem pro dictis secur. ponsones, chissels, pikkis, hakkis, et kevellis faciend., reparand., et emendand., ac eciam pro 4 petr. operat. in unum gavelok, 2s. Et in reparacione 25 secur., pecia ad 1d. ob. 22 ponsones cum chissels 4 ad 1d., 4 hakkis, 6d., cum calibe per diversas vices, et pro emen∣dacione 25 wegis, pecia ad ob., et pro duobus gavelokis, 2d., 5s. 4d. Et in acuacione MlDccc securium cementar. per diversas vices, centum ad 11d., 16s. 6d. Et in cariacione sabuli ad pavimentum extra portam australem, 12d. Et in una serura pro hostio domus cementar., 2d. Et duobus carrectariis d'ni Prioris pro serotecis et pro rewardo, 12d.
Summa, 36s.
Summa secundi quarterii, 37li. 5s. 3d. (37li. 6s. 3d.).
Summa tercii quarterii anni, 30li. 10s. 6d. ob.

DIV2.HEAD: Compotus fratris Joh'is de Billefeld In continuation of the above account, and on the same roll. de denariis per ipsum receptis et expensis circa structuram nove coquine a Dominica secunda prox. post festum Sci. Michaelis Archangeli, Anno D'ni Mocccmolxviijo.
DIV2.P: Idem respondet de 100s. receptis per manus Bursarii dicta die Dominica. Et de 40s. rec. de communi collecta per manus d'ni Petri de Dunelm.
Summa, 7li.
Summa quarti quarterii anni, 31li. 19s.

ROW.CELL: D ni'ca in festo Natal. D'ni.

DIV2.P: Summa primi quarterii anni, 29li. 4s. 1d. ob. (29li. 5s. 1d. ob.)
Summa secundi quarterii, 31li. 4s. 2d.
Summa totalis vj quarteriorum in isto compoto, 180li. 18s. 7d.
The following entries, included in the weekly pay∣ments, could not be tabulated:—
Exp. min., etc. Week 27. Item in acuacione 200 securium cementar., 100 ad 11d., 22d. (Included above).

Week 32. Joh'i Prentys pro acuacione 300 securium cementar., 100 ad 11d., et pro reparacione 5 securium cum calibe, pecia ad 1d. ob., 3s. 4d. ob. Item pro repara∣cione unius mallei quarer. et emendacione catene batelli, ac eciam pro serotecis carectarum, 2s. 6d. (Included above).
Week 48. Et Joh'i Prentisse pro 4 instrumentis reparatis et aliis instrumentis acuendis, 15d. (Included above).
Week 50. Et eidem Joh'i (de Bykerstath) pro ebdomada precedente, in persolucionem pro 4 diebus et di., 12d. (Included above).

Week 56. Item Joh'i Prentys pro acuacione 800 securium cementar. et pro reparacione 8 punsons cum calibe. Et pro 3 hakys faciend., 7s. 4d. ob. Item pro acuacione de 12 wegges, 6d. Item eidem Joh'i Lewyn pro una roba, 13s. 4d. (Included above).
Week 79. In acuacione 1500 securium cementar., centum 11d., 13s. 9d. In reparacione et posicione 9 securium et 8 ponsons, cum calibe, 12d. (Included above).

DIV2.HEAD: Comp. fr. Joh. de Beryngdon, 1368-9.
DIV2.P: Rec. 1723li. 3s. 3d. ob. di. qa. This half-farthing comes from 9li. 9s. 5d. ob. di. qa. received from rent in Spennyngmor for Pentecost term.
Cum rem. et arr., 2781li. 11s. 1d. di. qa.

Garderoba. 2000 de Walsnotes in precio 2s. 6d. In tribus lib. rubee cere empt. pro sigill. d'ni Prioris, 3s. Et in duabus unceis cerei nigri (sic) empt. per Burs. pro exp. ejusdem, 3s. (sic). In uno pelle Cervili, pro teracione, 2 aliorum pro cerotecis faciendis, 3s. 1d.
Marescalcia. In 40 petr. ferri empt. de Henr. Marschall petr. 10d. ob. qa. et plus in toto 21d. ob., 37s. 7d. ob.

Dona et ex. Prioris. Ep'o puerorum de Elemosinaria, 3s. 4d. Cuidam deferenti porpas de Insula de Farne, 12d. Rob'o Trompour et Will'o Fergos ministrallo in die Sci. Cuthberti, 5s. Cuidam Heremite et uni nuncio d'ni Regis, 8s. 8d. Item uni fuganti unum Aprum de Billyngham et alteri deferenti ferinam, 2s.

Exp. nec. In uno cultello empt. per d'nm Will'm de Kellowe pro le Dressour d'ni Prioris, 20d. D'no Ep'o Ebor. pro sigillacione unius litere, 6s. 8d. In exp. d'ni Will'i de Kellowe apud Mugleswyk pro venacione, 4s. 1d. In quatuor quart. salis del Bay empt. apud Hertilpoll, 21s. In carnibus empt. de Celerario pro diversis operariis comedentibus in parvo (sic) domo Burs. et in patria, 4s. 10d. In reparacione lavacrorum in claustro, 26s. 8d. In exp. factis pro uno Watergat pro minera de Raynton, 8li. 17s. 4d. In exp. Ade le Burserman misso cum uno Palefrido versus Ep'm Lincoln. et cum leporariis versus Regem, 25s. 11d. ob. In lesys et colers empt. pro dictis leporariis, 10s. Circa le Watergat mynere de Raynton, 4li. 8s. 4d. Palicero de Mugleswyk et Joh'i Rogerson custodientibus duas portas parci ibidem, pro pane militari, eo quod non ceperunt, 4s.

Exp. min. In repar. unius serure pro fonte Conducti, 2d. In pane empt. pro canibus d'ni Prioris, 2s. 11d. In Pilchis faciend. pro pistrina, 3s. 7d. In Chapis empt. pro leporariis d'ni Prioris, 15d. In una catena empt. pro eisdem canibus, 14d. In uno capucio coruino, 8d.

Repar. domorum. In expensis factis circa facturam Nove Coquine a festo Sanctorum Nerei et Achillei Anno D'ni, etc., lxviij usque finem hujus compoti, tam de Cementariis quam operariis quarer. et aliis minutis expensis pro eisdem, ut patet per quaternum continentem dietas, iiijxxxvli. xs. vjd. In reparacione molendini de Schelom, per manus Ade Milner, 5s. 8d. Will'o Lym∣bronner pro comburacione et implecione trium thoralium calcis, 22s. 6d. Thome de Tyndall et Rogero Carter frangentibus petras pro eisdem, 24s. In 50 quart. calcis empt. de Will'o Lymbronner pro manerio de Beaurepayr (et) pro 2 domibus in Crosgat et Eluet, quart. 5d., 20s. 10d. Mulieri colligenti mosse et hather pro stagno molendini Abbathie, 20d. In reparacione del Mesyndow, 5d. Ric'o Glasenwright pro reparacione fenestrarum Capelle de Beuleu, ut patet per parcell. d'no Priori liberat., 14s. 10d.; pro factura porte vivarie ibidem (Ketton), 8s.; pro mun∣dacione vivarie ibidem et fossat. circa easdem (sic), 27s. 4d. In hercis et Oxbouys emptis pro manerio de Meryngton, 19s. ob.
Focale. In 8xx Celdr. Carbonum Marinorum empt. apud Kymmelsworth, Middelwod, et le Brome, cum cariacione earundem, Celdr. 17d., 11li. 6s. 8d.
Summa exp., 1701li. 2s. 1d. ob. qa.

DIV2.HEAD: Comp. ejusdem, 1370-71.
DIV2.P: Summa Rec., 1736li. 14s. 7d. qa. di. qa.
Cum rem. et arr., 2652li. 13s. 8d. qa. di. qa.

Garderoba. In 3 flaskets empt. pro dicta liberacione (pannis, etc.) carianda, 9s. 4d. In panno empt. pro uno garniamento pro puero del seler', 7s. 6d. Roberto Carter et socio suo pro suis Curtbyis emendis ex precepto d'ni Prioris, 5s.
Marescalcia. In una sera empt. pro les hayhous de Beurepayre, 4d. In uno doset emp. pro longa carecta d'ni Prioris, 14d.
Dona et ex. Prioris. Fr. Damdode (?) ordinis Sci. Augustini, 6s. 8d. Vicario de Pittington ad reparacionem pontis de Suthpittyngton, 20s. Rogero Couhird ad pontem de Aldyngrygge, 13s. 4d.
Exp. nec. In uno hayer empt. apud Thrisk pro thorali, 60s. 6d. In exp. d'ni Uthredi Supprioris existentis apud Ebor. per 6 dies in convocacione cleri, et eciam eundo et redeundo, 43s. 3d.

Exp. min. In cribris empt. pro granario et thorale, 10d. In filo empt. pro le Hayre consuendo, 6d. In una campana pro Infirmaria, 20d. In exp. d'ni Uthredi supprioris apud Aukland et Stokton, 2s. 9d. ob.

Repar. domor. In expen. factis circa facturam Nove Coquine a festo Scor. Nerei et Achilley Anno D'ni Mill'io cclxxo usque idem festum Anno revoluto, tam de Cementar. quarerar. et aliis minutis expensis, iiijxxxviijli. xijs.
Summa exp., 1462li. 6s. 2d.
